Reviews.Title: “Very brief stay”
Reviews.Author: WhitlocksEnd
Reviews.Content: A post cruise day room was included as part of our cruise package. Short transfer from the Port of Miami, reception struggled to cope with the large number of guests checking in at the same time. Room although a little tired was very well equipped. The coffee provided in the room was excellent. Took advantage of the free, regular, hotel shuttle to get to the airport where we are able to catch a bus Miami Beach for the princely sum of $2.30 each way. This ensured that we were able to make full use of our day in Miami. Only disappointment was that we had to check out of our room at 16.00 which left us a bit in limbo prior our evening flight back to the UK.

Reviews.Title: “Very good stay.”
Reviews.Author: cancun123455870
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for one night with an early morning departure from the airport. Served our needs perfectly! Very comfortable bed, and the free shuttle to the airport runs every 15 minutes and the ride to the airport takes less than 5 minutes. Would stay here again. Got a good deal with a Priceline bid.

Reviews.Title: “Not that great for a Sheraton”
Reviews.Author: Rosafresa
Reviews.Content: Hotel was beautiful....about 20 years ago i guess... the carpets are dirty, the elevators, doors and windows are in real need of been replaced. Certainly not what you will expect from a Sheraton. Pros: The lobby attendants are great, and really friendly, and the area pool is good. The beds are great too! really comfy! The free shuttle to and from the airport every 20 minutes certainly adds points.

Reviews.Title: “Great staff”
Reviews.Author: GrayHairedGranny
Reviews.Content: We used the Sheraton as the gathering point for a trip to Cuba. The room was quiet and comfortable. We particularly enjoyed the flatbread pizza in the patio restaurant area. We have to say a big thank you to Geo Zeledon and the Sheraton -- we had a post Cuba medical emergency -- Thanks, Geo for driving us in your car to the Coral Gables ER and getting us settled in.. and thanks to Holly Cabell in the ER for your care and attention... not quite how we planned to celebrate St Patrick's Day --- but you made it memorable for sure

Reviews.Title: “Review of apparance of the hotel room”
Reviews.Author: DaleGoehrig
Reviews.Content: I think it is time for the Sheraton to replace the worn carpet and worn furniture in Rolom 353. We were really surprised to find a room in this condition at a Sheraton. We were surprised that we had to pay $15 a day for parking.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Amenities and Caring Staff”
Reviews.Author: spgplatinumchicago
Reviews.Content: We have had several recent stays at this hotel, and each has been exceptional. The hotel is located adjacent to a canal and golf course, providing very pleasant views. The lobby area is very open, with a tropical theme. Considering its proximity to Miami airport, we very rarely heard any associated noise (a great). Our suite was quite large, with a great view of the canal/golf course. Everything was modern, functional, and comfortable. The dining area was very light and well appointed, with a wonderful outside covered eating area, providing great views. The restaurant provided many choices (along with a similar and innovative menu at the Vin Bar seating area). The Chef, Frank, is extremely talented, creative and friendly. The fitness center is up-to-date with all of the equipment one would need. Most important is the wonderful staff, from Dave Berger (the General Manager), Raul Ulloa (Hotel Manager) and everyone working there. They all make us feel like 'Family'. Special thanks to Nicole and Sonia for always making sure that everything exceeds our expectations !!!! One more important point: the hotel is pet friendly and our 2 dogs (Cirneco del Etna) love staying here. There is sufficent walking area, etc. Everyone makes them feel like they belong. We look forward to many more stays.

Reviews.Title: “Very convenient and quite nice too!”
Reviews.Author: Jonathan H
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Sheraton Miami airport on March 1st. I have to say for an airport hotel this one was very nice. The staff was good, the decor was nice and the room was very comfortable. The hotel is located right next to the rental car return area of MIA. We returned our rental car the night before our flight to save time. It was great to just take the shuttle to the airport, sooo much easier. I highly recommend staying here if you have an early flight out of MIA.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient & Great Value”
Reviews.Author: jvalente_ca
Reviews.Content: Family(2 adults, 2 kids aged 8 &13) stayed here the night before our cruise. We chose this location as we are SPG members (4000 points for this reservation)and it is across the street from MIA car rental, so very convenient for us to drop-off rental and get a free shuttle ride to port(using Alamo) Hotel & Room were very clean, beds comfortable, nice view over golf course.Hotel parking was $15 with in/out.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient, comfortable travel hotel”
Reviews.Author: RozzyW
Reviews.Content: My family & I just concluded a one night stay at the Sheraton Miami hotel. Paul checked us in and was very pleasant & polite, as well as speedy. After a long drive to Miami, it was greatly appreciated! We stayed in a very clean and comfortable club level room. Great view of the Miami skyline and golf course. The club lounge is currently being renovated, so it is in a temp location. The snack selection at night could have been improved, but the cold drinks and breakfast in the a.m. were great. No complaints about this stay and we would definately stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “sheraton Miami”
Reviews.Author: Jill H
Reviews.Content: great manager at desk - Stanley!! very nice and accomodating hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hospitality”
Reviews.Author: namatrip1
Reviews.Content: Staff's hospitality is excellent, especially bell / drivers. Free shuttle is available every 15 minutes and some payable shuttle for shopping mole also available. Only 2 regrettable points are, there is no much choice of menu in restaurant and fresh fruits provided in the room were left until a lot of fungus grow. But overall it is very recommendable.

Reviews.Title: “Geo Zeledon”
Reviews.Author: Lisa H
Reviews.Content: Geo was great. He helped us find a great local restaruant and he made sure we had safe trasportation to the beach. Loved him and the Hotel (especially the gym). I will recommend!

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff - great value”
Reviews.Author: atd817
Reviews.Content: We arrived and were given a great room with a nice view of the golf course. Everything was clean and neat. The only negative was that the hotel was an expensive cab ride away from South Beach. We asked for assistance in choosing dinner options that were local. The front desk and staff and gave us some great choices. A driver named Geo Zeledon was so kind as to recommend a wonderful low key restaurant named La Rosa to us! He was so helpful and we are grateful! We enjoyed ourselves immensely! Definitely recommend a stay here!

Reviews.Title: “Traveling with family”
Reviews.Author: vicenters
Reviews.Content: We Spent one night in Miami. The hotel offers shuttle to and from airport. Excellent service and friendly staff, close to the airport, and the breakfast is really excellent.Thank you.

Reviews.Title: “Nice room with great airport location”
Reviews.Author: Hisfriend
Reviews.Content: Very close to the Miami airport and a typical, nice comfortable room. Put on the concierge floor with access to the lounge. Breakfast was a little disappointing in the lounge even though the Spanish lady there was wonderful. Know that you have to pay for parking or Valet at $15/night for either so it is worth it to valet. Will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Three stays in January”
Reviews.Author: wvugrad2001
Reviews.Content: I am a regular guest of the Sheraton Miami Airport Hotel, I ended up staying there 3 times this January for a total of 13 nights. For the most part things were great, which is something I have come to expect from this hotel as the staff is some of the best I have experienced in a hotel. Food in the restaurant was wonderful and the breakfust buffet is quite good. The only two issues I had during my stays in January were the quality of one of the rooms I had to stay in for one night and the temporary location of the Club Lounge. The hotel was sold out for my first visit and the room I was given had to have been given to some pretty rough guests as the furniture was broken and the carpets were badly stained. Dave, the hotel manager, had the room cleaned before I returned from work the next day and still moved me to an upgraded room for the inconveinience. He also treated me to an exquisite dinner in the restaurant (the warm duck salad was incredible). I truly appreciate the quality staff at this hotel who go above and beyond to provide excellent service. I can't wait to experience the new Club Lounge when it is finished. The current set-up in a suite and the previous set-up in the bar are nice but neither has had any hot food which was a great feature of the old club room. They are trying their best, but it is the small things regular guests miss. Thanks again for the excellent service and I'll be back in April.

Reviews.Title: “Good for quick overnight.”
Reviews.Author: twip
Reviews.Content: Nice place to stay for either late/early flight. Free shuttle is convenient. Very nice to sit by the pool and watch golfers. Rickenbackers we felt was a bit expensive and long wait for change when paying the bill. Lobby was open and clean with lots of sitting spaces. Rooms were nice, clean and functional. NOTHING nearby! must take taxi to shopping area [$10] or anyplace else to eat. Breakfast is NOT included and you only get 24hr free internet. Use points and stay for free then this place is great!

Reviews.Title: “Thank you Sheraton Airport”
Reviews.Author: Reyhaneh S
Reviews.Content: Spent one night in Miami. They got me a shuttle to and from my interview, they helped navigate me to the Beach afterwards, and they kept my fragile personal belongings in their storage once I checked out....WITHOUT a problem. FRIENDLY STAFF, CLOSE TO AIRPORT, WONDERFUL SERVICE...and the pool was warm and perfect. THANK YOU AGAIN...

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful staff!”
Reviews.Author: Therese B
Reviews.Content: Planned a trip to Miami and stayed here for five days to celebrate my husband's and our daughter's birthday. The day staff at the Rickenbacker restaurant namely Cecilia S., Aracelis A., and Carlos(cook) made their special days extra special! They brought out a mini cake and sang for them! They also was very attentive. Their service outstanding! We travel a lot and the experience here was by far memorable courtesy of the staff. A slight glitch to our stay happened on our last night. One of the servers seemed to be overwhelmed and it reflected on his service. He was abrupt but it was rectified by a very professional, and accommodating gentleman named Elvis (I think is the manager at the restaurant). Overall, this hotel and the staff made our vacation special. Would definitely consider coming back. We highly recommend this establishment.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient for the airport”
Reviews.Author: Eddie_Aberdeen
Reviews.Content: stayed here before an early morning flight as its near to both the airport and car rental center. At best i would say its dated and in need of a spruce up although to be fair it was clean and comfortable. Check in was good and efficient and the bar staff were friendly. Bar food was average at best my club sandwich tasted a little of stale oil and had obviously been grilled on the hot plate my wife's chicken tenders might have forced a visit to the dentist they were to hard although she did say the french onion soup was very tasty. The guys on the shuttle service were very helpful trying to manage lots of folks all wanting to be first on or off. I would probably stay here again but my expectation level of the brand would be very much reduced.

Reviews.Title: “Convenience”
Reviews.Author: travel-king13
Reviews.Content: Booked on Hotwire and was very happy to get The Sheraton because of it's proximity to the car rental center. Arrived after midnight very tired after a long day and flight. Shuttle arrived within 10 minutes and it was a short 3 minute drive to the hotel. Check in was very fast, less than a minute since all my information had been already provided. My room was right next to the elevator, as most Hotwire rooms are, it didn't bother me, but I can see how it may be bothersome for others. The room was small with two comfortable queen beds. The bathroom was a good size, but the pedestal sink had no place to put personal toiletries. When I woke up in the morning and opened the curtains, I had a great view of the Melreese Golf Course and the city of Miami in the distance. Overall, decent but not great.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from Home”
Reviews.Author: Andres G
Reviews.Content: It is not easy to work out of home town; however, it is priceless to find a home away from home, and I found my home at Sheraton Miami Airport Hotel. I am staying every week since last September 2011, and I will continue. This hotel has the best staff ever, an excellent GM working hard to improve the hotel everyday; a great sales person that is more than a marketing is a friend, thank you Jose. Thank you Kat and Stanley for your special way to help and treat everybody. Furthermore, to start your day you can enjoy a breakfast like home. It is an outstanding service with and unique staff with person like Carlos, Domingo, Bostone, Ruben, Melissa and the rest of the team. If you are coming to Miami, I recommend you the best place to stay "Sheraton Miami Airport" Sincerely, Andres Garcia!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Very Pleasant, Good Airport Hotel”
Reviews.Author: NellieVA
Reviews.Content: I spent one night at the Sheraton Miami Airport after arriving on a late-evening flight. The pending Boat Show had most of the hotels booked in town, and I didn't want to try and navigate an unfamiliar city after flying all day. Got a good price on this hotel through Priceline, and was very pleased with my stay. The location is VERY convenient for the airport, and in hindsight I could have waited to pick up my rental car the following morning, as they are so close to the Rental Car Center. In fact, the hotel is located directly at the bottom of the ramp as you exit the Rental Car Center. It is not overly easy to cross over and enter, but it's still a good location. Parking is by valet only, but it was easy and very quick. I called as I left the room in the morning, and my car was already waiting when I reached the lobby. The room was clean, in good shape, and very quiet. I never heard anyone in the hallways, or even the normal sound of pipes, etc. My best compliments are saved for the bed, which was extremely comfortable. Props to Sheraton for this. Overall, it was a nice stay. I can't imagine staying here if you're not wanting to be based directly at the airport, but if that's what you need, the Sheraton is a good choice.

Reviews.Title: “Convienent, sufficent, ok are the words I use to describe this hotel.”
Reviews.Author: 2worldtravelersnj
Reviews.Content: 2 nights while working in Miami area, right next to Miami International which is really the best thing is has going in my opinion. It isn't easy to get in and out of if you aren't familiar with the area but once you get the hang of it, not bad at all. Staff upon check in were all very nice from valet to front desk. Valet only and it will cost you 15 a day so be prepared. No upgrades available even though I called twice and asked and they told me they would do their best, well best didn't work :) All good though, standard king room with some air purifier thing. No mini refrigerators left which bummed me out but access to lounge with status is a bonus! Didn't get good sleep here at all. It must have been the combination of my neighbor and the air purifier, just didn't work for me as well it was a bit worn out so I never felt comfortable from the start. I get a bit freaked out when I see dirt and grime and I did in the bathroom, carpet and curtains. It was by no means unbearable just not to my liking. Gym was good, plenty of gear, unsupervised minors though can pose an issue. Pool looked good but didn't use. Lobby was nice and bar seemed good. All in all a decent stay but would I stay again, most likely not. Will look elsewhere to find what I like most in a hotel when in town.

Reviews.Title: “Smelled and Carpets Stained”
Reviews.Author: JayandLisa
Reviews.Content: We used their park and fly parking garage so we decided to stay at the Sheraton Miami Airport for the convenience due to an evening flight. Our first room smelled of mold and the carpets and walls were stained. The second room on a different floor smelled of smoke,had stained carpet, and had loose tiles in the bathroom and had moldy water stains around the air conditioning duct. Our third room at least didn't smell but had large stains on the carpet and hand prints on the walls. This hotel needs a complete rehab. The owners should put some money back into this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great staff”
Reviews.Author: JoulesToronto_Canada
Reviews.Content: Geo Zeledon greeted us and made our last night in Florida so much easier by taking charge of our luggage, directing us where to return rental car, arranging shuttle for 5.00 am. Thanks for making our departure so much easier.

Reviews.Title: “Sheraton Miami was wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: jennifer s
Reviews.Content: I visited this hotel with my 3 children for a weekend trip to Miami. Although my booking company messed up my reservation, Stanley who was working at the front desk was incredibly kind and patient. We interacted with staff from Guest services, housekeeping, and valet, and all were so professional and courteous! This is one os THE BEST hotels I have stayed in!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: SUPERMARIO-NY
Reviews.Content: This was a very convenient hotel, Very clean hotel with a GREAT staff, they were so nice and helpful. I would happily recomend this to anyone who traveled to Miami.

Reviews.Title: “Nice staff & great room”
Reviews.Author: kt012885
Reviews.Content: I was nervous after reading some of the reviews but we got to the hotel at 10:30pm and we were welcomed to nice staff. We had a couple drinks at the bar (pretty expensive but expected) and we just stayed the one night. The room was cozy and clean with a comfortable bed! No complaints!

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff!”
Reviews.Author: Denise A
Reviews.Content: Alain assisted us after we had missed our flight. Alain was very patient and kind. We are very grateful for his help!

Reviews.Title: “very relaxing place even with it's location”
Reviews.Author: joannie p
Reviews.Content: I was happy to find this place to be quite relaxing and quiet. The service was excellent and we enjoyed spending time here.

Reviews.Title: “Great service”
Reviews.Author: kyfirefly
Reviews.Content: The staff was extremely helpful and went the extra mile to help. Geo Zeledon was very informative and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Stay before cruise”
Reviews.Author: pjw08
Reviews.Content: Only stayed one night before going on a cruise out of Miami. The hotel is a bit dated and the executive lounge was not up to normal level of Sheraton standard, however, based on previous review, this was apparently due to renovation going on at this time. Had a serious problem with housekeeping, but because of the diligence between staff and management a satisfactory resolution resulted in rectifying the situation.

Reviews.Title: “Try another hotel for your layover”
Reviews.Author: durgaChicago
Reviews.Content: This was only a transit overnight stop. The shuttle came quickly and the driver was helpful with the luggage. Check in went quickly because we had Starwood's gold status. The problem was the room. The upholstery was torn, the room lighting horrible and the phone was broken which necessitated a walk to the desk to inform them of the problem. A maintenance person came but couldn't fix it. The hallway drapes were very dingy and dirty and I detest seeing trays of half eaten food on the hallway floors. Breakfast food in the club lounge was below average, no variety and less tempting than my husband's Atkin's bar. A tV down the hall was blasting but thankfully, I couldn't hear it in the room. Try another hotel for transit.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for convenience to the airport”
Reviews.Author: vacationgirl105
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for one night with an early morning departure from the airport. Served our needs perfectly! Very comfortable bed, and the free shuttle to the airport runs every 15 minutes and the ride to the airport takes less than 5 minutes. Would stay here again. Got a good deal with a Priceline bid.

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful staff”
Reviews.Author: James F
Reviews.Content: The hospitality and technical staff that took care of us at the conference were top notch. Every request was returned with a smile and eagerness to meet the needs of our group.

Reviews.Title: “Stay on the golf course side”
Reviews.Author: get_with_it
Reviews.Content: We arrived at this hotel at 2:30 AM due to a late flight. The hotel is about a 5 minute cab ride from the airport. We went straight to bed and when we got up in the morning we were surprised to look out our window and see a canal and golf course. We went for a walk and out the front of the hotel we could see and hear the airport. If we had been on the airport hotel we would have been woken up earlier by planes. The bed were comfortable and the rooms clean. Lobby renovated, pool very nice. There is a strip mall about a 20 minute walk or $8 cab ride. I have booked this hotel again next month.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful pool area”
Reviews.Author: GAL01
Reviews.Content: The convenient access to the Miami Airport is a plus. The front windows look out to the monorail of the airport but the rear windows overlook a golf course. The pool patio area with its bar and grill provide a refreshing escape from the hustle and bustle of traveling. Although the hotel is a bit dated with the bathroom showing signs of wear and tear, the beds were extremely comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel close to the airport”
Reviews.Author: BenganJ
Reviews.Content: Stayed here a couple of days during Christmas. Great hotel which will be even better when they are finished updating the gym and the club lounge. Stayed on the club floor and the rooms needs some updating. Club loung closed and gym in a conference room. Breakfast in the restaurant which we got instead of breakfast in club lounge was really nice. Pool area with outside bar on the backside made it feel like a resort.

Reviews.Title: “Break fast at resto”
Reviews.Author: sam s
Reviews.Content: i stayed for a week at the hotel , i enjoyed the break fast and friendly stuff ,the greeted us with a great smile and excellent service , i like to hight light the flowing stuff , F rocha , polanco , melisa lopes and boston. thank you guys

Reviews.Title: “Breakfast Staff”
Reviews.Author: koko k
Reviews.Content: I was in Miami for business and I stayed in this hotel for a little over a month. Everyday I had breakfast at Rickenbacker and the entire staff are just great, super friendly, welcoming and full of positive energy. I would like to highlight a few who I became good friends with: Boston, F.Rocha, Polanco, Melissa and Stanley from front desk who always managed to recommend great evening restaurant ideas! To the entire team, thank you for making my stay a wonderful and pleasant one.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect”
Reviews.Author: Jonathan K
Reviews.Content: Absolutley a perfect hotel. The waiter named Boston was phenomenal. The food,the service and the entire staff was incredible.

Reviews.Title: “VERY GOOD HOTEL-EVEN AFTER CHECK OUT”
Reviews.Author: Julio B
Reviews.Content: This was a very good stay for me and my family. Everything was as expected from Sheraton. Very close to the airport. I had a small problem after I checked out. There was a charge in my credit card that I did not make. Somebody purchased 95 $ in the souvenir shop and charged it to my room. I noticed when I was checking oput and the receptionist ensured It will not be charged to my credit card because It was a mistake. After a few days the ammount was finally charged to my credit card then I wrote an email to Mrs. Camela, from the Finance Dept. She was very kind and the charges were reverted to my credit card. This was a good after checkout service from them.

Reviews.Title: “Unparalleled outstanding service”
Reviews.Author: HistoryChickadee
Reviews.Content: My organization hosted a five-day program for 60 attendees at the conference center at this hotel. We were quite nervous about having been located at an airport hotel, but the extraordinary service from every single staff member at this property simply blew us away. The manager of this hotel must be phenomenal because I have honestly never seen anything like the quality of the service here. (I am staying an extra night after my home airport being snowed in). Yes the hotel is a very tad bit dated, but it is clean and the beds are very comfy. Plus, the food in the restaurant and in room service is quite good...in fact our attendees could not say enough about the food provided for breakfast, lunch, and dinner (and snacks in between!). The only issue is that it is remote if you want to go to South Beach or downtown, or anyplace that isn't the Miami airport for that matter. How we got around that was the amazing people who took us in large groups in their shuttle. But no matter how you cut it, there are no walking paths to speak of. If you walk by the canal you risk "alligators and poisonous snakes" as the signs say all along the edge! The stories I could tell you about how the people here went above and beyond the call of duty are simply too numerous to list here. I would recommend the conference center for any business event and even if you are just staying overnight before or after a flight I would say that if you take a moment to chat with a staff member or ask them for or about something you will have a friend for your entire stay. I better quit gushing or you will think that I work for them! :-)

Reviews.Title: “Much better than expected - if you travel with a car check parking costs.”
Reviews.Author: Abarr101
Reviews.Content: Having read some mixed reviews I was a little concerned about my stay. These concerns were quickly dismissed by a friendly shuttle driver, efficient check-in and clean/comfortable room. The hotel is dated and parts are tired but all appears well maintained. My room looked recently painted with a new carpet. Food and service at Rickenbacker's exceeded expectations and the terrace/pool area is relaxing for an airport hotel. Just one point to note - despite the GM's assurances/feedback in a response to another review (23rd Jan '12) a sign on the concierge desk clearly states valet parking at $15 with NO in/out.

Reviews.Title: “Recent visit for Business Meeting to Sheraton Miami Airport Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Mark C
Reviews.Content: Busy airport hotel, at check in the room we were given a room that had not been cleaned yet, however we received very good service and support, especially from the Bellman - Ron Wilson, who assited us in getting into another room. He quickly moved us, involving the front desk and the hotel manager and was very helpful thoughtout the stay. Him and the team were very responsive and high level of service. At the end of my meeting I had a tight connection for my flight and Ron was able to get us over to the airport quickly to make the flight. Kudoos to Ron for his customer service orientation! Their business center and meeting facilities were very good from the rooms, AV equipment, snacks and refreshments for breaks etc....were very good, hey who expects Izze beverages in the coolers outside your meetings. The only negative as with most building in Miami and warm climates is contolling the temp, it always seems to be a bit too cool in the meeting rooms. My wife also mentioned the lunch down in the restaurant was very good, fresh and tasty offerings like a caprese salad which for the middle of winter to taste fresh is key. Only other recommendation is that you request an even numbered room, back of the hotel, with a nice overlook of the golf course behind and views of greater Miami. All in all a great hotel for a layover, transit or business meeting!

Reviews.Title: “So glad we did not arrange this stay”
Reviews.Author: LancashirePaul
Reviews.Content: We were booked in the Sheraton by our cruise line the day we flew out of Miami to Heathrow. On arrival the reception area was really modern, clean and welcoming. Check-in was fairly quick but they were busy with checking in a lot of guests who like us were getting day rooms before evening flights. The rooms were a reall disapointment, dark, dated, depressing and I hate to say, past there sell by date. The bathrooms had plenty of towels and toiletries but on the surface it appeared clean but thats where it stopped. On closer inspection there were weeks of dust on the pipes under the sink, sink plugs were filthy, mould stains on the tile grouting the silicon was black and some missing around the bath edges, so disapointing. Heavy thick layers of dust on the chrome fixtures and fittings. Of course, this is all down to the executive housekeeper and lack of their standards. I always believe and say, it starts at the top. I can accept older style rooms, it doesn't have to be to my style, but dirty thrown in the mix is a NO NO. The outside bar area where drinks are prepared was really dirty, mould, ground in dirt and the cocktail blender would be condemed if health officials inspected.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely view of golf course at dining room”
Reviews.Author: joanko
Reviews.Content: Stayed there in December for business. Enjoyed breakfast which was included in the rate. It was very nice and loved the view of the golf course at the dining room. Hope to play some golf next time when not on a business trip. Room was clean and comfortable. Only drawback was that it was hard to find(even with GPS) when one is coming from Miami. It was easy to find when coming out of the car rental.

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is schizophrenic”
Reviews.Author: nwterp99
Reviews.Content: The bar staff was friendly; the front desk was not. The bed was clean and comfy, but the carpet was dirty with stains. The building is old, but has been modernized with newer furnishings and decor. It's close to the airport, but other than that, there's not much to do around there. This place is good for one night stays if on your way to/from the airport or cruise port. Otherwise, you'll find downtown or the beach more interesting.

Reviews.Title: “Quality of the support service at lobby”
Reviews.Author: Carlos Miguel A
Reviews.Content: I would like to congratulate Sheraton regarding the professionalism of the support personnel at lobby. I had a superb service by Geo ZeledÃ³n. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant few hours”
Reviews.Author: Creditgirl
Reviews.Content: This hotel was part of a cruise package, we were given a room for the day before a night flight home. The room was large, well furnished and equipped but no safe with a view we hadnt expected for an airport hotel, looking over a golf course! We dropped our bags and headed out to the pool and terrace area. We had drinks and a snack while looking out on a waterway and golf course on the other side,all very pleasant and enhanced by the appearance of a manatee right in front of us! The foyer had a live departures board for the airport and we used the free internet service to check in online for our flight and printed boarding cards. There is a free shuttle every 15 minutes to the airport and a new train terminal is being bult opposite the hotel but not sure where this will go. Will definately use this hotel again for a lay over.

Reviews.Title: “No Complaints Here!”
Reviews.Author: UpstateNYerMeMa
Reviews.Content: We definitely made the right choice for a 2 night hotel stay prior to our flight from MIA. Having read many previous TA reviews, I had a preconceived idea of what to expect. I was more than pleasantly surprised that my expectations fell far below the actual experience. The area as you approach the hotel is a very commercial, active construction area, opposite an airport parking garage topped by a monorail, not very attractive. However, once inside the Sheraton's front lobby there is a complete visual transition. The public areas, pool, patio seating area, bars and restaurants are all attractively done in modern decor. The gym looks brand new and is very clean and well equipped. As you leave the lobby and enter the pool patio area , another visual transition takes place, you see lush greenery, a manicured golf course, water (canal?) even manatees and turtles were in residence there. We were fortunate enough to be in a 9th room facing that interesting golf course view and it was evidently soundproof since we saw, but did not hear, a few jets passing by. Loved the room, its view and especially the comfortable bed. The bathroom was not huge but was satisfactory. Each member of the hotel staff that we interacted was friendly, helpful and efficient, There was a small problem with our bill upon checkout but Sonia Steverson, Director of the Front Office, resolved the matter quickly to my satisfaction. The shuttle ride to MIA Section D took all of 3 to 5 minutes. talk about convenience. Yes, this is an airport hotel and not meant for long term stays, but in my opinion it has a small resort feel to it. When flying out of Miami, the Sheraton Miami Airport will be our hotel choice.

Reviews.Title: “Do your research first”
Reviews.Author: BrianE1968
Reviews.Content: This hotel is adequate for a quick layover but not much else. My wife and I stayed here overnight before a cruise. Be warned that this is valet parking only. It costs $15 to have vehicle parked and there is no in and out. But, you can catch the free shuttle to the airport to eat or catch public transportation if you want to go to South Beach. The hotel is a bit isolated so you either eat at the hotel or catch the shuttle to the airport. The bed was comfortable but this hotel is dated. There were broken light fixtures in the room, stains in the carpet, and an overall "aged" bathroom. But, if you are just catching a few winks between flights these probably aren't deal breakers. The staff was friendly and helpful, although a few of them struggled with Enlish.

Reviews.Title: “Excelent hotel near airport”
Reviews.Author: kerlinso
Reviews.Content: Had brief stay here and was very impressed - the room was quite luxurious and well equipped. Nice public area and pool area. Very efficient airport shuttle which takes less than 5 minutes to the terminal - a very decent airport hotel which looks as if it has been upgraded recently.

Reviews.Title: “Airline layover at the Sheraton”
Reviews.Author: Brock H
Reviews.Content: We hadn't meant to stay over the night but two American Airline maintenance issues left us late for our connector home and we ended up here. I'd like to say the room, restaurant and staff were fine but the food was not up to par for a place like this (tough chicken in the salad, wrong order brought the first time, overheard another table complaining) and the bathroom was more what you'd expect to find in a $59 Super 8. Adequate but small with a noisy fan and dodgy seat on the toilet. After a week in the Caribbean we weren't stressed, the room was free and the meals subsidized but if I'd paid full fare I'd be feeling differently.

Reviews.Title: “Starwood Gold upgraded room”
Reviews.Author: Peter S
Reviews.Content: My brother is a starwood Gold member and booked the rooms so we were able to get free breakfast and upgraded room. The rooms were very clean and breakfast buffet was excellent. The parking is valet only; no self parking. I prefer to have the option to self park so I don't have to wait for my car, but they give you a number to call ahead so we didn't have to wait that long. Free shuttle to airport was very convenient. Taxi service was very slow during this New Year eve weekend. We were actually informed that it would be faster to take the free shuttle to the airport to get a cab. Was very happy with this hotel and would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Element did not open”
Reviews.Author: SandG12
Reviews.Content: We had a say booked for the new Element hotel. I suppose they could not open as scheduled. They transferred our reservation to the airport Sheraton. They honored our great deal of hot breakfast and parking. The breakfast was good..... Thankfully free, otherwise it is 50.00 for 2! Room was average. They tried to accommodate

Reviews.Title: “Great place for you airport stay.”
Reviews.Author: PhilattheBeach
Reviews.Content: My wife and I had two stays at this hotel during our recent travels. Yes, there is renovation going on, but it did not interfere with our stay at all. Front desk staff was excellent. The restaurant was really good for breakfast (be sure and have the fresh-squeezed orange juice). It was wonderful to have good quality, free wi-fi so that we could check our flights and other travel details. The airport shuttle was flawless.

Reviews.Title: “glad it was only a day room”
Reviews.Author: gerbilhoward
Reviews.Content: we had our room for the day prior to our night flight home and were we glad. the foyer was very nice, our check was quick. the receptionist was cheerful and helpful. the pool area was small but with a nice view over the water and the golf course. the chambermaid was very helpful in helping us fine our room. the room was very dated but large. the quilt cover, sheets and pillowcases were very creased as if they had not been changed from the last occupants. our room overlooked the water and golf course which was very nice but would have been better if we could have seen out of the window. the window was double glazed but there was condensation in between the glass panels. the bathroom was very old and tired. the bath taps were rusty, the bath overflow cover was falling off, this meant we could see the overflow hole and is was so very dirty. the bath was so old it had permanent stains on it. the shower was not much better, dirty and rusty. I was glad it was only a day room and our friends drove us to South beach for the day. we only used the room to wash and change our clothes prior to our evening flight. the staff were all very nice and helpful but the hotel leaves a lot to be desired. Sheraton needs to spend a lot of money to upgrade and clean the hotel. would I stay here again?..................... definitely NO.

Reviews.Title: “OK hotel right next to the airport.”
Reviews.Author: mmppwwzz
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for one night to catch an early flight the following morning. For an airport hotel, it was OK. The hotel appeared to be very full the night I stayed. Eclectic crowd made up mostly of people who looked like they had been bumped from their flights. There were some random people who looked as if they were spending their vacation at an airport hotel which was somewhat surprising. Maybe a pre/post cruise crowd per some of the other comments. Check in was chaotic. The hotel is huge and with most people staying only 1 night, thereâ€™s a lot going on at the check-in desk. I can't say much about the pool, restaurants or other aspects of the hotel since my stay was so brief, but the bar staff were very friendly when I had a quick drink at the bar. My shuttle departed for the airport at the time promised. Overall recommend this hotel if you have to stay near the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Great overnight stop............!”
Reviews.Author: wallybaloo54
Reviews.Content: Very clean room, nicely furnished. Our rate included a buffet breakfast, which was excellent. Food in the dining room was a disappointment, and prices are quite high. Location is superb, with little time delay to catch hotel shuttle going in both directions. Perfect spot to stay if cruising, however, there are no other restaurants in the immediate area.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent airport hotel”
Reviews.Author: joeyboy79
Reviews.Content: Very clean and modern looking hotel, nice rooms, staff very courteous, very close to Miami airport, walking distance to car rental return.

Reviews.Title: “late flight in to Miami - good location”
Reviews.Author: HoganMalmo
Reviews.Content: Flew in from copenhagen and arrived in Miami late in the evening. Stayed our first night at Sheration Miami airport. The hotel was exactly what we needed. Speedy checkin, extremely comfortable beds and valet parking. The parking was a bit expensive. The hotel is located at a walking distance from alamo and other car rental companies. You can save money by picking up the car in the morning. We stayed at the 7th floor and the didnt expreience any noise from the airport or trafic outside.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Airport Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ncdoctooth
Reviews.Content: I am an SPG member who stayed at this hotel with his family for one night on New Years Eve. My observations: the rooms were updated and clean, the workout room was very nice, the breakfast in the restaurant was excellent. For only 3,000 SPG points a night, it was a GREAT value. I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Spa Sheraton”
Reviews.Author: Debra B
Reviews.Content: I just spent 7 days in Miami visiting my daughter for the holidays. After a couple of days in her cramped one bedroom apartment my husband and I moved over to the Sheraton Airport Miami. This was one of the best Holidays ever due to the incredible staff,of what we have now named "Spa Sheraton". We had a room with a beautiful view of a golf course. Spent a day at the heated pool in sunshine and we were 15 minutes drive from travel channels number one pick for Florida beaches "South beach". I have never been treated with such hospitality !! As a world traveler this has to be one of finest staffs of any hotel I have been to. From the housekeeping staff, restaurant ( which is awesome.. Do try the seared tuna). Smiling faces and friendly outstanding service!! I can not praise this hotel enough!

Reviews.Title: “Exceeded expectations”
Reviews.Author: MusicMajor
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed for 3 nights at this hotel in early December (visiting family in the area and then departing on an overseas trip). Our room (#631) seemed to be a small-ish, older room. However, it was spotlessly clean, with VERY comfy pillow-top beds, and Starbucks coffee. The staff at the reception desk was exceptionally helpful, sorting out some problems for us and printing out maps when we wanted to walk beyond the hotel/airport area. The small downside is that there are no other restaurants within a short walk. It took us about 15-20 minutes to walk to a small shopping plaza nearby. That said, the restaurant on-site is appropriately casual and quite acceptable. When booking, check the web site for their "specials". We got the "pay your year of birth" for one of our nights. This special is often sold out, but it pays to check!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Service”
Reviews.Author: reednikki
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I stayed here Dec 20th - Dec 23rd, the shuttle picked us quickly and the driver was so nice, he gave us the ins & outs of the hotel during our 5 minute drive from the airport to the hotel. I informed the hotel prior to our trip that my birthday is Christmas Eve and that this trip was part of my birthday celebration, the manager responded back to my email informing me that she was going to upgrade us to the club level. The club level offers a full american breakfast, bacon eggs, omelets & freshly made waffles. They also provided one cocktail and one app during the evening; because of this we barely spent money on food during our stay. The room was spacious and the bed was super comfortable, the only draw back was that there was not a fridge or safe in the room. South Beach was only a $27.00 cab ride away, tip: make sure they put the meter on and not try to charge you the flat rate from the airport which is $33.00. We hated leaving the 82 degree weather in Miami to come home to 40 degree weather in philly but that's the price you pay when you live on the east coast. We are already planning our next trip back to The Miami Shearton Airport hotel

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional service”
Reviews.Author: 35islandgirl
Reviews.Content: Stayed one night between flights. Nice but small pool. 5 minutes to airport. Super friendly and kind driver. Room nice but on the smaller side. Very clean and nicely appointed as a typical Sheraton. Decent food in restaurant, but exceptionally competent and friendly service and positive energy by everyone on staff who we encountered: maids, front desk, servers, bartenders. Allowed us to check in early. Even a maintenance worker wished us a pleasant stay while walking in the hall. This speaks to strong managers and work relationships. We were very impressed. THANKS SO MUCH,,,

Reviews.Title: “Convenient to airport, pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: kiwigal999
Reviews.Content: 5 min in shuttle from airport, shuttle came along every 15 minutes. clean basic rooms with excellent friendly staff. good wifi in room on 3rd floor. business centre had flakey internet connections and i was unable to get the printer working to print my boarding pass. surprising quiet given its location at the airport

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay before a cruise”
Reviews.Author: shummichael
Reviews.Content: Very nice, clean and safe hotel. Near the airport with free shuttle. Here's a tip I received from the shuttle driver. If you're looking to save about 30 bucks getting a cab from the hotel to South Beach, take the shuttle back to the airport and ask the driver to drop you off the staircase leading you to the bus terminal (which is downstairs from the airport). Once you walked down the staircase, take bus 150, which is an express bus, to South Beach (You can either get off at Collins or Lincoln). Trips takes about 40 mins at a cost of $2.35 pp (exact change require as the bus driver doesn't give change out). Thus no need to rent a car nor spent about 60 bucks RT from hotel to South Beach.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel Stay”
Reviews.Author: Joe c
Reviews.Content: Great Hotel & Staff that do an excellent job with guest. They shuttle to & from the airport for free which is just 5 min from the hotel. Very good food at the restaurant also with a very good staff there also. All for a very reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: “Beyond Expectations”
Reviews.Author: Los C
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Sheraton for the Thanksgiving holiday and couldn't be happier. The thing is I didn't even expect the high level of service I received. The staff made me feel like I was the most important guest at the hotel, what a beautiful feeling. I really appreciated GEO ZELEDON who went out of his way to make my accomodations comfotable.

Reviews.Title: “Good Airport Hotel”
Reviews.Author: MrEdnWilbur
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located less than a mile from the airport and a cab is not needed because they provide a shuttle service to and from the hotel. The front desk staff was a little slow in processing the arriving clients because they were new and being trained. The lobby was smallish but modern looking but my room decor was not. Carpeting was torn in places, wallpaper was discolored in many spots and furniture was worn looking. The company I worked for provided a lunch buffet for us and it was a decent Spanish type meal. The hotel bar was a nice place to hangout and if hungry they offer some bar type food. For outdoor activities,they provide an outdoor pool, a shuttle to the Dolphin Mall or play a round of golf next door.

Reviews.Title: “Nice views, fresh decor, convenient to airport and Miami but front desk service was poor”
Reviews.Author: glbltrotter
Reviews.Content: I generally don't like staying at airport hotels, but when I am arriving very late, and leaving early, they can sure be convenient. My expectations for the Sheraton was low - given other airport hotels I've stayed in. Cons: The front desk staff was unorganized and not that friendly - even though I was a platinum member. When I arrived at the front desk, the attendant didn't notice that I had booked a promotional rate that included an amazon gift card and some coke products, and a plush polar bear. I had to bring it up, and then he began telling me there was no notice of it in my record. I double checked my reservation online at SPG and sure enough, it was there. Another attendant immediately took over - who said he couldn't access the promotional goods right then but told me to check in again in the morning. He was a lot more helpful - I was wondering why wasn't he working with the preferred customers - the other guy seemed indifferent and defensive. When I went to get the products and inquire about the amazon gift card in the morning the attendant told me the 'room where the products were was locked and only the manger could get them' and that the gift card would be emailed to me in 6-8 weeks - not right after my stay as I understood. I told her to not bother with the drinks, but if she could get me the plush coke polar bear I'd appreciate it. I waited for 15 minutes, and had to leave to catch a shuttle for my flight - without the plush polar bear for my daughter. I didn't get my bill print out either - Not a huge deal - but I was really looking forward to taking it home to her. I spent 15 minutes the night before, and another 15 minutes the next morning to no avail. I'll be surprised if I get the amazon gift card as promised. Pros: For an airport hotel, if you are lucky enough to get a room on the rear side of the hotel, you look over a golf course and the city skyline in the distance. If you get a room at the front of the hotel you're going to have a view of a busy street, and parking garage. Also, the rooms have a fresh decor, and the hallways and common areas were clean and well maintained. This hotel use to be a Wyndam and ithe fresh and light filledd theme compared to a lot of the dark and stuffy Sheratons I've stayed in before, was a nice change. The airport shuttle was great - both the pick up and the return went without a hitch and were really quick trips. The driver couldn't have been nicer. I had early meetings and missed breakfast. When I returned to check out and head to the airport I checked the dining room about breakfast. They had just shut down, but the waiter and the greeter got me a big bowl of fruit and some juice - and couldn't have been friendlier or accomodating. Also, I noticed the pool over looks the golfcourse and river - and loked like pleasant setting if you had a little daytime to catch a little Florida sun between flights. Overall, the building and facilites and shuttle service were better than expected - especially for an airport hotel. I wish the service at the front desk was as friendly and efficient as the staff in the dining room and the shuttle. I really wanted to take home that little polar bear to my daughter and didn't have 30 minutes of limited time trying to get the front desk to honor the promotion as promised. I'm not very hopeful regarding the amazon gift card given all the confusion at the front desk.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay near airport”
Reviews.Author: TravelerAlways1234
Reviews.Content: Everything was clean and neat. The front desk staff were friendly and helpful. The restaurant food was excellent and moderately priced. Our watier, Boston, was extremely helpful and attentive. Great views of the golf course from restaurant and patio. Definitely a step above a standard airport hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay between flights to the caribeean”
Reviews.Author: Foster7204
Reviews.Content: We were flying to the Dominica Republic and stayed here between flighhts. They have a quick shuttle from the airport, which was great! We were picked up and in the hotel within 30 minutesmof our arrival. Desk clerk very pleasant as was the shuttle driver. He was so funny, felt like we were on a tour, not just being shuttled to the hotel. The room was very commy and the bed was "heavenly" really, especially after a long flight! They have a great exercise facility, no charge, and everything was clean, plenty of towels to use while working out. Breakfast buffet was great, and since we are SPG members was included inour stay. Waitstaff was very helpful, coffee cup always kept full and hot. Everyone here was friendly, kind, and went out of their way to make our stay nice and welcoming. We also stayed here on our way back from our trip and this is where we had problems. Again same quick pick up from the airport, and quick ride to the hotel, quick check-in, great rooms. The only hitch was that there was confusion about room service. We even called room service the night before we were leaving, and were told to just state on the card that we were leaving early, and they would bring our breakfast at 5. Well no go. When I got up, I checked outside our door and saw that they did not even pick up our room service card. We were told that the card needed to be on the door by 2 am. I put it out by 11:30 pm, but no one picked it up. When I called the desk, at 4:45 am, I was told that room service is not open till 6, even though the card is marked that breakfast could be delivered between 5-5:15am. Our bill was delivered shortly after this phone call and the room service card was picked up, I even called room servic and left a message, but no coffee or breakfast was delivered. This was our only problem, lack of communication about room service, and I reallly really wanted my coffee. I did make coffee with the in room coffee maker, so I was not a total wreck!

Reviews.Title: “A Little Tired But Has All The Right Moves”
Reviews.Author: westerner1
Reviews.Content: Staff are excellent! Our waiter (Boston) was exceptional! The airport convenience combined with a lovely new patio and bar overlooking a prisitne golf course makes this property a combination "airport/resort" experience. The value can't be beat!

Reviews.Title: “Good cruise overnight”
Reviews.Author: wanderingman09
Reviews.Content: We stayed here overnight in November prior to joining our NCL cruise at the Port of Miami. Got a good price on Hotwire and found the hotel to be quiet and comfortable. It was good to be located near the airport after travelling much of the day and arriving in the evening. The restaurant was good, breakfast buffet better than the dinner experience. Sat by the pool which overlooks a golf course before leaving for our cruise. Staff were welcoming and friendly--overall a good choice of a place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Nice accommodations and restaurant”
Reviews.Author: Trinibahamamama
Reviews.Content: After missing my connecting international flight home from Trinidad, which was the last for that evening through no fault of my own, I was rebooked to travel the following morning. I was given accommodations by the airline for the night at the Sheraton. Suffice to say, the experience overall was pleasant except when I returned at 4:00a.m. from an all night shopping spree at Walmart, to an empty bell desk and invisible security. I had to struggle with a number of shopping bags to my room. Non the less the few hours of rest was very refreshing . The bed was comfortable and the room amenities quite appropriate including an all white decor of the bedding. Later that morning I enjoyed a quick a la carte breakfast that I ordered in the restaurant although room service and buffet service was available. The snack at the restaurant the previous night upon arrival was also a treat. Special mention should be made of the pleasant petite female bell attendant who collected my bags and escorted me to the shuttle for transport to the airport. I should also mention the courteous bellman upon my arrival who suggested I take a taxi instead of renting a car to the department store which was only a few miles away. I certainly I will return for a stopover visit in the not too distant future.

Reviews.Title: “Good choice close to MIA”
Reviews.Author: TCSuwGA
Reviews.Content: Decent choice if you need to stay near the airport. Most other hotels are on the south side of the highway. The hotel is located on the main artery leaving the airport. A few things to note: the hotel is upgrading its workout facility, making accomodations by placing fitness equipment in a make shift conference room. The club level lounge is also being rennovated, so Club level travelers make do with breakfast in the main area. The hotel, which I believe is an old Hilton or Wyndham, has been rennovated. I recommend requesting a view of the golf course. It was nice to wake up to a view of the sun rising over the course. The staff was attentive. However, if you have your own car, no that access is tricky. See the other reviews. I recommend valet (same price as self park) but give yourself extra time. Only 2 people bringing up vehicles during "crunch time" in the morning. Again...good choice for those seeking to stay close to MIA. Full disclosure: I am SPG Gold.

Reviews.Title: “Dissapointment in Miami”
Reviews.Author: Peter W
Reviews.Content: The single biggest dissapointment about our overnight stay at the Sheraton in Miami was the almost total lack of any sort of customer service. There was one exception - full marks to Miguel in the bar; he was friendly, worked hard, listened and made a great effort to find the wine that I wanted. The rest of the staff, front desk, concierge, restaurant just went through the motions. The hotel also looked liked it could use a good clean in some places, mainly public areas, but our room was OK, big enough and had the right amenities and the Sheraton bed was heaven (as usual), the shuttle service to the airport worked well and provided us with the means to go sightseeing although the concierge desk failed to suggest that as an option and left it to us to sort it out for our selves.

Reviews.Title: “Great customer service”
Reviews.Author: Stefanie H
Reviews.Content: My husband and I recently went on our honeymoon and passed through Miami to get to Costa Rica. To make a long story short, we were denied entry into Costa Rica due to the expiration date on one of our passports. When we were shipped back to Miami, we booked a room last minute with the Sheraton Miami Airport Hotel. When we checked late at night we asked to speak to a concierge the following day to set up a new trip, since we couldn't get into Costa Rica. The next morning, we spoke with Alain, and he helped us arrange a rental car - even had them pick us up at the hotel! - and helped us find a resort in Key West for the week. Alain and everyone at the Sheraton made a big difference in turning our horrible honeymoon into a great one! Thanks so much for the great service :)

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel close to the airport”
Reviews.Author: Hans-Bogaert
Reviews.Content: This hotel is close to the airport and there is a hotel shuttle service every 15 minutes. It takes less then 10 minutes to get from the airport to the hotel. The hotel is conform Sheraton standards. In other words it is clean and it has a comfortable bed. The staff is friendly. Although the airport is close by it will not disturb you. There is a small swimming pool with some deckchairs if you want to sit outside and relax. From the pool you are looking at the golf court so no the view is not bad. No restaurants within walking distance. Unless you take a taxi you have to use the hotel restaurant or pizza delivery service. The hotel restaurant food is not that great but unless you take a taxi you have no real alternative. If you want to do some shopping then there are a few malls in the area you could visit. The international Mall and the Dolphin Mall. There is a shuttle service to both malls that stops at the Sheraton. Expect to be in the shuttle for 30 minutes to 1 hour. A taxi ride to Miami Beach south is $30. here you can walk the boulevard, do some shopping and have a drink or meal.

Reviews.Title: “RESTAURANT”
Reviews.Author: Francisco G
Reviews.Content: good service and very nice attend Mr. BOSTONE was very friendly with us and He did an excellent work attending us.

Reviews.Title: “Victor Calderon and Miguel”
Reviews.Author: Jcclavel
Reviews.Content: Victor and Miguel they provide excellent service at the bar. Specially after a long trip I had. Service with a smile and a warm welcome!

Reviews.Title: “Worth every cent!!”
Reviews.Author: Saf512
Reviews.Content: We were treated very well at the Sheraton. We had a club level room on the 10th floor that was very clean and satisfactory. The morning buffet was included in the price and was wonderful. We enjoyed complementary drinks and starters from the bar due to hotel construction both nights of our stay. Victor M. was an amazing waiter. We received great service with a smile. Victor went out of his way to make sure we enjoyed our stay.We would highly recommend this hotel if you want a nice clean hotel with very friendly staff. We also used the pool. It was nice, warm and clean.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for a short stay or if you lime golf”
Reviews.Author: Adolphflyer
Reviews.Content: Very good if you plan to stop one night or if you want to stay colse to airport. The shuttle bus is perfect. The hotel is good the reception is very well organized and friendly. The room is very clean and silence

Reviews.Title: “Great Restaurant experience”
Reviews.Author: Stephen D
Reviews.Content: We travel a lot and the hotel bar experience is as volatile as the stock market - Extreme highs and lows. Well, we luckily caught a high as the dynamic team of Victor Colclenet and Miguelito treated us to first class service - enough that we would consider no other hotel when we choose to stay close to the airport again. Their level of service was superb. We had the seared ahi and were surprised that it was as good as any restaurant we'd visited.

Reviews.Title: “Sheraton Hotel”
Reviews.Author: linda_travel_review
Reviews.Content: The Sheraton hotel is very convenient for an overnight stay if you are flying/arriving at the Ft. Lauderdale airport. Shuttle Service is every 30 minutes and on time. Would not recommend the restaurant for breakfast. Expensive!!! Since buffet was too much food, opted for pastries for quick breakfast. This selection is expensive and pastries were ice cold. Better to get your quick breakfast at the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Good for a short stay”
Reviews.Author: Design123
Reviews.Content: The lobby and public areas of this hotel have recently been renovated and are now very pleasant. The hotel has a convenient location right next to the car rental centre at Miami airport and from there it is easy to get into Miami and out to the Everglades to the west and to the keys to the south. The room had recently had some upgrades but the refurbishments could have gone further, the bathroom floor and tub tiling were very old. Overall the hotel was adequate and convenient for a short stay and when booked through a discount agency reasonably good value for money. The 3.5 star rating is probably correct the hotel could not be considered to be four stars. There is no sidewalk or direct route from the car park to the hotel and walking on the roadway back to the hotel is a little risky. The layout of the parking is also rather confusing and the signage not helpful. Valet parking is only minimally more expensive than self-parking and therefore I would recommend this option.

Reviews.Title: “Nearest to the airport, tough to drive to”
Reviews.Author: jfmelle
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Sheraton Miami airport for 3 nights in November as part of a business trip to the Miami area. I was scheduled to arrive early in the morning for a business meeting, so I requested a reservation for the night before to assure I could arrive, check-in and get a shower. Prior to the trip, I even logged at the SPG website and filled in information and confirmed my arrival time there (there's a field for that there). For my surprise, when I arrived I was informed that my room was assigned for somebody else because I didn't arrive the prior night. The information I filled in at SPG website was not available, as systems were not integrated (front desk information). After half an hour of conversations, a room was finally designated to me in a floor that was under refurbisihing. The room was not that clean... The room is big, and bathroom was clearly refurbished recently. Hotel has no free parking. Free wifi at the room and public areas, good speed and reliable. Hotel location isvery near to the airport, but it is very tough to drive to there from somewhere else, due to the frequent renovation on airport access and lack of update of most GPS devices.

Reviews.Title: “Horrendous”
Reviews.Author: Em2014
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with my husband and miother earlier this year. The hotel was very tired, the staff were unbelievable rude (a few laughed at any requests we made at reception), the lifts looked like they were 30 years old and the corridors were old and vile. The room seemed grubby throughout and the only saving grace was the bed which was very comfortable. To be honest, the bed looked to be the only clean thing in the whole hotel! I would avoid at all costs. This hotel put us in a very bad mood before we got on our Celebrity Cruise...

Reviews.Title: “I couldn't get out of their comfy beds...”
Reviews.Author: Roqster
Reviews.Content: I snagged a room at a great price for an over night layover in Miami. It was a shame we had an early flight because those beds were hella comfortable. Sheraton just set the new standard for hotel beds and pillows! Only complaint was that hotel is removed from downtown and other places to do stuff, but the trade off was the free airport shuttle that runs every 15 minutes.

Reviews.Title: “Pre Cruise Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Daniel P
Reviews.Content: Just a note the say THANKS! The hotel was AWESOME! Everything from shuttle pickup to checkout was OUTSTANDING! The driver from the airport had a great personality. Check in was quick and easy. The room was great with a FABULOUS view. Breakfast in the restaurant was superb. We dined out on the patio in the open air. I stopped by the front desk with some questions about the area and Charlotte was very warm and helpful. I can tell by the atmosphere that most of the employees were happy and enjoyed working here. I would definitely would stay here again and recommend anyone coming to Miami area stay also. THANK YOU!

Reviews.Title: “Incredible!”
Reviews.Author: JimRinggold_Georgia
Reviews.Content: I was stunned by how incredible the movement towards excellent this property has experienced sine my last visit, earlier this year. GM David Berger and his entire team are working feverishly to build this hotel as a premier gateway hotel to the cruise lines, South America, and the world. The staff is fabulous, especially if you have the chance to meet Charlotte at the front desk, Jose, in the bellman/parking desk, or Cecelia in the restaurant. The SPG lounge is set to open up in December, having undergone a complete renovation. The outdoor area by the restaurant has been completely cleaned up and beautified with some luxurious outdoor sitting and dining furniture. The entire atmosphere of this place is just marvelous. This is my hotel of choice when traveling with Starwood in South Florida. Thanks for all the hard work, David. It is showing significant and positive results! Dr. Jim Barrett

Reviews.Title: “desaster!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: camilla5555
Reviews.Content: the worst hotel...bad service,bad reception,no attention at all......the only thing that works is the valet parking.....the manager should be ashamed!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “*Fantastique*”
Reviews.Author: JaneBonnieC
Reviews.Content: Best hotel option if you have a flight arrival late at night. The hotel is less than a 2mins (free) shuttle ride away from Miami International Airport. The staff there are professional and curteous. And I must thank the maid who found and gave me back my camera's memory stick which I lost in the lobby....my world would've came crashing down had she not picked it up and returned it. Food was great! Had a full and healthy breakfast there. Couldn't have asked for more. Also internet is free. The rooms were nice (stayed there 2 separate times before and after the cruise) No complaints there. Definitely will book with them again the next time I'm in Miami.

Reviews.Title: “Faulty Towers”
Reviews.Author: JG200
Reviews.Content: Huge lines at check in with only one staffer. In restaurant it took forever to get a menu and waiter never came back. Took shower and it suddenly turned scolding hot and I couldn't turn it off. It's probably still running. Oh, all of our TV remotes needed batteries.

Reviews.Title: “First Class Service”
Reviews.Author: SunSouth
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Sheraton Miami Airport was outstanding!! If you want excellent customer service you must stay at this hotel. Was there a week for an Amerijet conference and had the best experience I've ever had at a hotel. Rooms were very clean and the sleeping beds were so comfortable and the linens so crisp and clean every day. Henry the Tiki Bartender was a treasure! The hotel staff was very accommodating, friendly and willing to assist us - especially Ruben Javamillo who was exceptional and maintained such a high level of professionalism the entire time of our stay. We recommend you try this hotel - it will not dissapoint you!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel with very gracious staff”
Reviews.Author: gab11_11
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel with helpful staff. Very conveniently located within minutes of the airport. Rooms are exceptionally quiet, clean, beds comfortable, and staff are exceptional, anticipating our every need. The restaurants were excellent and reasonably priced. Stanley, the manager, made us feel like we were the most important guests in the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Average airport hotel”
Reviews.Author: udo_schuklenk
Reviews.Content: I have read the other reviews and wonder whether I stayed in the same hotel yesterday. The airport transfer is efficient, but do keep in mind that the property isn't in walking distance to the airport, so you need to add time to get to/fro the airport. They bumped me up to their 10th floor (Starwood Preferred guests). It's a construction site, so I had to walk over plastic sheets of some sort to get to my room. The room was typical Sheraton, I can't complain about the basics (great bed, wireless internet access reliably worked and was complimentary for a change, excellent coffee making facilities). The trouble is that the air conditioning unit is seemingly quite old, so it made sufficient noise to wake me up several times throughout the night. What's the point of staying in a hotel room over night if the aircon wakes you up all the time! They also added another unit aimed to clean the air in the rooms (they make big hay about it, so there's an explanatory card and whatnot). I switched it off to decrease the noise levels in the room just a little. I had dinner in the bar. What a disaster. The French onion soup was ok, the chicken caesar salad an unmitigated disaster. I ended up paying over 50$ for what turned out to be a mediocre meal. The wine wasn't drinkable to be honest. I agree wholeheartedly with various guests' comments on the friendliness and professionalism of hotel staff. Everyone I met (even the guy who served the lousy food in the bar) was truly pleasant to deal with and helpful as far as that was feasible. Beware, some of the buttons on the phones (eg 'Wake-up Call') are actually dead, nobody will respond when you push the button. Would I stay here again, truth be told, I will, given that reviews of the only alternative hotel in the airport vicinity indicate a much worse property.

Reviews.Title: “Service, Service, Service”
Reviews.Author: dp p
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at the Sheraton Miami Airport before and after our trip to St. John, VI. I was expecting another shabby airport hotel and I was pleasantly surprised. The staff is excellent and we were treated very well. The pool and restaurant were very good. The service was great. We spent some time with the newly hired manager of food services, Javier, and he was excited to improve the level of food services at the hotel. I must admit that I was really impressed with everyone we met at this property. Everyone was happy. They seemed intent on making their guests feel welcome and relaxed. The highlight of our visit was Geo at the valet desk. He gave us the royal treatment by driving us to and from an off property dinner. He also rolled out the red carpet for my little girls upon our return to the hotel. They were thrilled. I am a platinum SPG member and stay in a lot of hotels for business. Our stay at the Sheraton Miami Airport made us feel special. Our very pleaseant stay was was totally unexpected. I think that Starwood has a little gem in this property and the people that work here. I look forward to visiting again sometime soon.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous as always”
Reviews.Author: Beth J
Reviews.Content: I have been staying at this property now for 2 years. My most recent stay was on 11/4/and 11/5. Courtesy Van; All the men that are at the bell desk and drive the van are very friendly and accomodating. Truly professional. I always I look forward to seeing the front desk employees. Mr. Pierre, Charlotte, Miriam and Nathalie (as are all the front desk employees) are always wonderful to me when I check in. When I ask for a refrigerator or to have maintenance look at my air conditioning it is done right away. I always ask housekeeping for extra towels as I walk to my room.The housekeeping staff is very friendly and accomodating. SPG lounge. I love Ana in the morning. She always asks after my children and how I am doing. Restaurant and Bar. Wow, tonight was truly exceptional. I asked waiter Miguel Gutierez if they had corn tortilla's for the quesadillas and he asked if I was gluten intolerant. I told him I was and that Chef Frank Liberoni does keep gluten-free bread for those of us that are gluten-free. Kudos to chef Frank and Miguel for making a wonderful quesadilla on toast points for me. Then Miguel said that to call ahead in the future to let chef Frank know that I will be arriving so he can purchase what I would like to have at the restaurants to accomodate my diet. Music to someone with food allergies. Lastly, I would like to state that I was only scheduled to stay one night and woke up with the flu causing me to stay another night. When I asked Mr. Pierre if he could extend my visit one more night it was 'not a problem at all'. He also asked if he could bring me anything if I was too sick to come to the SPG lounge or lobby shop myself. I am certain that the hotel was overbooked as it often is but he always seems to magically "make it all happen" for all his guests and employees. I love this property because the employees make me feel at home as possible when I am on the road. You are lucky to have such fabulous people.

Reviews.Title: “Central location”
Reviews.Author: Royalfalcon1
Reviews.Content: Since this hotel has undergone renovation it has become a much better place to stay. Nice rooms with special air filters for customers with allergies. Cosy beds. Aircondition is noisy.

Reviews.Title: “Different MIA Hotel---More of The Same”
Reviews.Author: ElvisPWorldwide
Reviews.Content: Oooo boy, here we go---another MIA airport hotel. I should probably wise up and quit staying at MIA airport--and stop complaining about the hotels there. I've long ago come to expect the substandard levels of service and cleanliness that most MIA typify. From leftover food in my room from the previous guest, to checking into a room with someone already sleeping in the bed---Iâ€™ve pretty much seen it all at this airport. Maybe for that reason I was excited by the spiffy reviews for the MIA airport Sheraton. As my business often dictates, staying in the city was inconvenient so the airport it was. On first look, the Sheraton was clean, renovated and well thought out. Nice common areas, reception, rooms, gym---in truth, the entire property is good. I believe this hotel used to be a Wyndam so a refresh was obviously done. But despite the new look, the same service prevailed that is common at the local hotels. My first day they did not replace any towels and it took a few phone calls to get linens before I could take a shower. This was complemented by leftover grounds in the coffeemaker, no replacement of cups and amenities (club level) and an overall lack of cleanliness in the public areas. It seems every surface I looked or leaned upon had leftover food crumbs or something sticky slopped upon; the place was unkept. This was the case in the temporary club lounge and in the restaurant. The valet parking was the real treat as it look around 20 minutes each morning to get my car. Lots of chaos, lost ticket, lost car and twice brought me the wrong vehicle. Ever since somebody took the MIA airport Hilton and flushed it down the toilet, itâ€™s been a dicey proposition getting a good hotel at MIA. Maybe this is the best of the lot and I should not be so picky. As I will inevitably be back at MIA, Iâ€™ll probably end up staying here again. I just hope they replace my towels next time.

Reviews.Title: “Easy to forget it's an airport hotel!”
Reviews.Author: ccctravels
Reviews.Content: The drive up on the hotel feels very much like an airport hotel but I really liked that it is on a golf course and has a nice pool/pool bar! Clean, modern and very well kept property. I also felt like the front desk was friendly and efficient..the even remembered me.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel, Great Location”
Reviews.Author: ILoveToEatOut
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Sheraton Miami Airport for a couple of days on the tail end of a trip to Miami. Although this is a fairly old hotel, they have kept it nicely up to date. The rooms have been recently remodeled, and everything is clean and modern. The beds were very comfortable, and the amenities were nice (although not outstanding). The pool area is nice, and the business center is well appointed and convenient. The location is perfect for airport connections: it is literally directly in front of MIA, and less than a three minute ride over to the terminals. For early morning departures this is ideal.

Reviews.Title: “Location is its best feature.”
Reviews.Author: Theguyin4B
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located almost in the airport. A free shuttle runs every 15 minutes most of the day, or you can take a quick ten dollar cab ride. The hotel is aging, and needs some refurbishing. The resturant is passable, but not outstanding. Beds and pillows are comfy but the rooms and bathrooms are small. I stay in this hotel often as it is quick, convient and relatively inexpensive. Room service was prompt and reasonable. I had a prepaid rate of $176 with tax about $200. A good value for an airport location.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, excellent service...!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Viyar
