Reviews.Content: The hotel is perfectly located just in front of the Miami Airport and minutes from shopping malls and freeways... The service at the front desk was more than excellent. Same at the restaurant, the breakfast (buffet) is very good and the staff is very friendly and ready to help...!!! The rooms need some minors repairs but overall they are good...!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel 5 Mins From Airport”
Reviews.Author: girlish_sista
Reviews.Content: Fantastic hotel. Within the airport complex but the rooms were very quiet. Would definitely recommend for a stop over or if your flight is rescheduled like ours was. We booked online and saved $50 versus the price offered to us by the front desk. Rickenbackers Restaurant offered awesome food. Servings were huge and comforting! Would happily stay again if we had a connection or stop over.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent facillities and Services”
Reviews.Author: MARC T
Reviews.Content: I have been staying at the Sheraton (formerly Wyndham) Miami Airport for many years. Since Sheraton took over the operation, things have vastly improved as far as service. The facilities are being upgraded, the service is very good, and the meal service in the dining room is excellent. Perhaps the biggest surprise is the friendly staff, especially Stanley :Pierre, the manager, who greets many of the guests personally. It is clear there is a new philosophy of service at this hotel, and it is personified by all employees. I travel around the world and always feel at home at this hotel. The rooms are spacious and quiet, and the exercise room is great after a long day of work or travel. It takes two minutes to get from the airport to the hotel, which is a real plus. I am willing to pay a little bit more for the Sheraton than other hotels because of the perks and treatment.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel conveniently located by the airport”
Reviews.Author: Boret1
Reviews.Content: After a horrible experience in a Sheraton in Nassau, I am happy to report that this Sheraton in Miami is making me recover the faith in this hotel chain. From the moment I walked in the service was great (Thanks Johally!!) I was treated like a king, the room service was fantastic and the room was clean and comfortable. Eventhough the hotel is very close to the airport the room I stay at was very well issolated and I was not bothered by any noise from any planes. If you need to stay close to the airport or you need a great deal for a hotel in Miami stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Sheraton Hotel stay...”
Reviews.Author: Bree S
Reviews.Content: Overall I enjoyed my stay at the Sheraton. I liked the fact that it was sooooo close to the Airport! I thought for the cost of the stay, it was nice. My front desk rep was really awesome!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Staff at Rickenbachers "In House" Restaurant”
Reviews.Author: Brian Z
Reviews.Content: Ruben J. took care of us for breakfast this morning and he not only provided a friendly and kind greeting to start our day but kept our glass full and our table well attended! I thanked him and told him I look forward to our stay....look for Ruben J. at this Sheraton because he is one of the rockstars that make travel today bearable! Thank you Ruben, God Bless!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic service, stylish upscale hotel, great for buisness trips!”
Reviews.Author: Lisa1529
Reviews.Content: We were so pleasently suprised by this hotel, the service was outstanding and I have never stayed in a cleaner hotel. Lots of nice thoughtful little touches, great buisness center. The valets were fantastic! The room had black out shades and a lovely king sized bed. We weren't expecting much from an airport hotel but were pleasently suprised and will stay there again if in the area again.

Reviews.Title: “Good for the price, easy parking”
Reviews.Author: JaimeH_FL
Reviews.Content: Nice comfy bed, close the airport, shuttles run every 15 minutes, easy and cheap parking.

Reviews.Title: “landed exhausted into hotel heaven.”
Reviews.Author: nellpernell
Reviews.Content: Quick and easy transport to hotel from airport. Great staff, efficient, helpful. Rooms were excellent, morning breakfast was very good, and then immediate access to the airport. It was a short visit and provided us with exactly what we needed, fast, perfect service, super comfortable, clean room with good breakfast and back to the airport with NO SNAGS.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel - excellent service”
Reviews.Author: barbara f
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just got back from a weekend at this hotel and had a wonderful time. We were very impressed with the service level of every one we encountered, our room and the well kept grounds. Dining at Rickenbacker restaurant was excellent - not to mention the encounter we had with our service attendant, BOSTON who was professional and just an AWESOME guy

Reviews.Title: “Sheraton Miami Airport - 29th September 2011”
Reviews.Author: Philip D
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Sheraton Miami Airport Hotel on night of 29th September and want to praise the warm welcome and efficiency of the check-in process afforded by a member of the front desk team Stanley Pierre who did an excellent job. Stanley was highly courteous, friendly & knowledgeable and a great ambassador for the hotel and the Sheraton brand generally. Stay was good, sadly only a short one but I would use the hotel again if I come back to Miami airport area and would recommend to others for sure. Philip Davis

Reviews.Title: “Understaffed, poor customer service......”
Reviews.Author: KwesiDapper
Reviews.Content: The room was good the 1st night we arrived. I had to ask the manager to send housekeeping by the 3rd day to clean the room, it was like we were abandoned. We went out the 1st night only to realise that they were short staffed with valet, after waiting almost 1 hour we had to get our car for ourselves. When we returned our keys did not work, wen we went to the front desk we were no where on the system. They had to re-book us back in the hotel & re-issue new keys. They then said that they had to swipe my credit card again for a $200 deposit. Charlotte Sylvain has the worst attitude and should be moved to housekeeping. Thank goodness for the manager on duty, i forgot to get her name, she saved the day. I will never stay in this hotel again........

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: dasgfdgfdgfd
Reviews.Content: had a business trip mixed with weekend pleasure and decided to stay at the Sheraton Airport- great stay, had lots of fun, superb staff and good rate. like the food/cold beer at the tiki hut out back! excellent place to stay! dave s.

Reviews.Title: “Six week stay”
Reviews.Author: Jeff C
Reviews.Content: After staying here for five weeks and having a great deal of trouble receiving my mail and packages, I had the good fortune of having Raquel Maris from the front desk assist me. Seeing my frustration she assured me she would find my missing mail. After a great deal of research (during her break) she found two letters that had ended upstairs in the corporate offices. The letters were addressed correctly and had my room number included in the address. Employees like this make a long hotel stay much more tolerable.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, wonderful for connecting flights”
Reviews.Author: Kristina L
Reviews.Content: This hotel really should be the airport hotel. My husband, myself and two kids stayed here on the 10th floor, when we looked out the window we could watch the sky tram go by just across the street/parking lot. Literally it is only two minutes from the airport so you can leave on the shuttle pretty much when you need to be to the airport. Customer service was great, we had help with our luggage and a quick tour of the hotel and amenities on the way up to our room. The room was great, they were a little small, but still great! It was nice the room has a robe inside with all the normal shampoos and soap with the addition of shower gel, shaving cream, and mouth wash. My only complaint was there was two sets of single serving coffee, it would be nicer to have a pot that makes two cups, but beyond that there were only enough cream and sugar for one 16oz cup, If you have two cups, let us have enough condiments for each cup :) I was very happy to have complimentary bottled water in the room, and they were drank immediately. My husband did go to get ice and the machine was out of order, other then that everything was great. And lets face it machines break down from time to time, really no biggy. I would totally stay again. We were able to get a clean room with air purifier...absolutely wonderful

Reviews.Title: “Great Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: carlee2266
Reviews.Content: I spent one night in Sept at The Sheraton Miami airport on our way to Atlantis. The hotel is a beautiful hotel but after a long flight we encounted the BEST Customer service by an employee by the name of Stanley Pierre. As a frequent traveler I must say this was the best customer service experience I have had in quite a long long time. It was a breath of fresh air since now a days traveling it is hard to find... We will return to this hotel for longer stays thanks to this wonderful experience with Stanley. Keep up the Great work !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “OK for a night,”
Reviews.Author: cybername
Reviews.Content: I spent one night at the hotel after a long flight. It was ok, but the hotel has certainly seen better times. The first room had a smell so I asked for anther one which was promptly done.The rooms are ok but dont's expect something fancy. The hotel is really very close to the airpoirt, right across the street when you exit from the car rental station. Parking is about 15$ a night. They served excellent breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Easily accessible, but parking is expensive!”
Reviews.Author: Lee W
Reviews.Content: Great hotel and facilities. Ask for a room that overlooks the golfcourse - much nicer than the highway view that you get on the other side.. Parking adds up quickly - $12 daily self park is the cheapest you can get. Breakfast buffet is extensive and great food.

Reviews.Title: “airport hotel that is starting to show its age”
Reviews.Author: petewanner
Reviews.Content: this is an airport hotel that has been very well maintained - but just like me, the place is starting to fray at the edges and showing its age - little things in the room - loose fittings, chipping paint, wear spots on linens and rugs - but they still have the ability to charge full tilt including some very expensive parking front desk could not have been more helpful or pleasant, rest of the staff a bit aloof. Ate in the restaurant - really good food, but service was stand-off-ish. Watched a ball game in the bar with some fellow travelers - the servers were attentive but not engaging with the crowd The excercise room has a great view and for a hotel, well equipped

Reviews.Title: “Very close to the airport great service”
Reviews.Author: Rafaelplatino
Reviews.Content: Excellent location, room very confortable, free transportation to airport and the Mall, I will stay here again

Reviews.Title: “great stay!”
Reviews.Author: q b
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed my short stay at the Sheraton and Breakfast buffet was fabulous just as good as a spa resort Especially was waiter Bostone very personable and plesant.

Reviews.Title: “Melissa went out of her way to make my stay comfortable and enjoyable.”
Reviews.Author: Carluccibop
Reviews.Content: I really want to let everyone know that Melissa gave exceptional service. I was tired and stressed from missing my connecting flight. Melissa went out of her way to look after me and pretty soon I was much less stressed and I went on my way the next day, relaxed and happy. Great hotel, great staff. Carlos Quintero

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel... bad lost & found experience”
Reviews.Author: diane a
Reviews.Content: Honestly, I would rate this hotel and service while we were there as excellent but unfortunately, my glasses were left in the room and they disappeared. When I called lost and found the lady was really nice and helpful, but informed me that nobody had reported my glasses. SADLY, I KNOW my glasses were left there, and perhaps room service took them.... it is unfortunate not to be able to trust that the lost and found service will work. Integrity is key and I am really disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Staff”
Reviews.Author: Andres G
Reviews.Content: This is the hotel with the BEST staff ever. At the lobby you will be treating like a king by individuals like Stanley; and as soon as you go to your room you will be enjoying a quiet and confortable atmosphere. Following morning, as soon as you enter to take your breakfast, you will see the most outstanding staff, like Bostone and Ruben. If you are planning to go to Miami, I recommend you this hotel, and you will never regret.

Reviews.Title: “rcasi101@gmail.com”
Reviews.Author: rcasi
Reviews.Content: I was awarded this hotel through to a bid at a travel site, but if I would had paid full price my rating will be about a 2 1/2. The price I paid was very good and I was able to overlook certain things.. I did like the stay on various aspects like service, and room cleanness. I did not like the location of the hotel and I will only recommend if only using for airport stay.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location.”
Reviews.Author: VacationDreamer1048
Reviews.Content: Hotel is located opposite where we collected hire car. Easy to find. First class breakfast - numerous variety of choices. Only stayed one night so did not fully use all facilities. Room looked towards airport and miami mover but not noisy. Other rooms had view of golf course and city skyline. Good standard of accommodation and service. Did not use hotel restaurant at night. Variety of menus in room information to arrange delivery of food to room. Clean room, friendly staff. Member of group in a wheelchair, hotel interior easily accessible, did not need adapted room so unable to comment on this aspect. Would stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Employees”
Reviews.Author: ronworldtraveler2011
Reviews.Content: I am writing to inform you that during my stay at your hotel, there were two employees in particular who went out of their way to assist us and make us feel comfortable. They are Johally and Torri. They are definitely an asset to your organization and a model for others re: the high quality of service possible. Our thanks to both of them. Ron Konowitz

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value and location”
Reviews.Author: RobertW62
Reviews.Content: Stayed one night early this week at this hotel in order to catch early flight the next day. Excellent value for what I paid for. Clean room, very friendly hotel staff and very nice hotel restaurant. More importantly, from the room where I stayed, no airport noises at all. Definitely, will stay there again next time.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Service”
Reviews.Author: ndresdow
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff were all wonderful, especially Boston A. in the restaurant. Thank you guys for all your hard work!

Reviews.Title: “Great location and view!”
Reviews.Author: gsnapps
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have stayed at this hotel twice in the last year and have had a great experience every time. The back of the hotel overlooks a beautiful country club golf course and a canal, so you can beat the views! I never heard an airplane, even when we stayed on the top floor. The food and dining staff were very gracious, even when they were insanely busy and we have nothing but good things to say about our rooms and the rest of the staff we encountered. Definitely worth a stay if you want to be near the airport, but rent a car if you want to explore.

Reviews.Title: “Commendation”
Reviews.Author: Rogelio C
Reviews.Content: My wife and I enjoyed our stay at your hotel. Your staff was very helpful and was always willing to go the extra to ensure we were comfortable and happy with the place and service. We particularly would like to comment Staff Geo Zeledon for his extra assistance and hard work. He is very dedicated to his job and takes pride in serving all the patrons. My wife and I hope to stay at your hotel the next time we are in Miami. It was relaxing and staff are very professional. Thanks again for you services. Respectfully Rogelio and Adrian Cumberbatch

Reviews.Title: “Convenient, but not up to Sheraton standards”
Reviews.Author: DebJ14
Reviews.Content: My husband and I booked one night at the Sheraton Miami Airport because of its close proximity to the airport. While waiting for our luggage I called the hotel to inquire about the shuttle. I said I was in baggage claim and the woman lectured me that the baggage level was not the pick up place and that I needed to go up to the departures area. She was very rude. The shuttle driver was very nice and came down and assisted my husband with the luggage. He called ahead to say that Starwood Preferred Guests were coming in on the shuttle. They rolled out the red carpet (literally) and put us in the SPG check in line. The woman at the desk said she was leaving and we would have to wait for someone else to check us in. Someone finally came. I was irritated when he told my husband that as SPG members breakfast was on the house when in reality we paid for the bed and breakfast package. We got our keys and headed upstairs. We previously stayed at the hotel when it was a Wyndham. It appeared that Starwood upgraded the furniture and TV and the King bed was very comfortable, but the bathroom was not clean and there was mildew on the old, worn tile.We paid extra for a room with a view, but the windows were filthy. We went down to the pool, but it was overrun with screaming kids so we just sat in the sun as far away from the noise as possible. When we returned to the room we noticed that my husband's credit card was not returned to him at check in. We found the person who checked us in and he had the card and gave it back to my husband. We did not have a car so we ate dinner in the hotel restaurant. The food and service were good. The presentation of the cheesecake and key lime was very nice and both were delicious. We also had breakfast the next morning and our server Francisco Roche from Brazil was excellent. We had the buffet, which had a nice selection, and Francisco kept the coffee, juice and water filled and we enjoyed talking with him. Francisco was the highlight of our stay at the Sheraton! We walked across the street and picked up our Hertz Car. The doorman at the Sheraton kept the key while we retrieved our luggage and checked out. The line for check-out took forever. There were only 2 people at the front desk and there were at least 5 other guests waiting to check out and at least 10 people waiting to check in. While the hotel is convenient to the airport, we probably will not stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Good Choice”
Reviews.Author: MARC D
Reviews.Content: I arrived to Miami late around 2 am just staying one night passing through was there no longer than 5 minutes when i see the Sheraton bus passing by the driver Gorge which i wont forget jumped out of the bus grabbed my luggage an said "Let me have your luggage your on a vacation just seat back and relax" which I really wasn't but made me feel like one. He walked me to front desk which was quite sleepy NOT A GREAT IMPRESSION! Breakfast was great not expensive at all for a Continental. Will definitely stay there again RECOMMENDED.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect overnight accommodations close to the Miami airport.”
Reviews.Author: EvanC
Reviews.Content: I selected this hotel after being bummed from my flight to Dallas. The price was great for the cleanliness and convenience. The hotel shuttle runs 24 hours and was the perfect solution for me to get from the airport to the hotel and back early in the morning. Most hotels don't offer shuttle service before 7. However, this hotel did which saved me on cab fare. The only issue with the hotel is location to other dining choices. There is nothing with in walking distance. The rooms were bar-none the cleansest and most comfortable. A++ to the property staff and management for making my stay there great. Tips: purchase food/snacks from the airport if you are arriving late at night. The convenience store in the hotel lobby was closed when I arrived around 10:00 pm.

Reviews.Title: “Sheraton Miami Airport”
Reviews.Author: Pamelammi
Reviews.Content: We stayed here two nights, 9/14 and 9/22/11. The first stay we arrived early (12:15 PM) and had to wait for our room to be prepared for 1 1/2 hours. After dropping our luggage off in our room we hurried down to have lunch in the restaurant. We did not have a good dining experience, but the chef came out and apologized, and did not charge us for our lunch. The food was good, but there were some mishaps. We did not expect him to take care of our bill, but were pleased by this. On 9/22 we arrived later in the afternoon and were greeted by the front desk clerk very cordially, and she even gave me a card to share our experience with tripadvisor.com. That evening we returned to dine at the restaurant onsite, and had an excellent experience with very good food, wine, and service. The bell staff here are very attentive and helpful, as are the valet staff. We would recommend this hotel, It is right across the street from the airport and you don't have the airplane noise in the rooms. The rooms are comfortable, and I like that they provide Starbucks coffee to help me wake up in the morning! We also appreciated having a t.v. station that showed our flight status, and there was also a display in the lobby that did so as well.

Reviews.Title: “Great overnight stay!”
Reviews.Author: donnalorrig
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel the night before our cruise which left out of Miami. Everything was very nice and clean. There were 6 of us traveling together, so they gave us adjoining rooms. The restaurant served a great dinner and pool area was clean and inviting and we spent several hours there. Front desk service was quick and pleasant. Taxiâ€™s were waiting right outside the door as we checked out and took us to the seaport in the morning. Although the building was constructed in 1977 is appears to have been well maintained and updated nicely. The shuttle from the hotel to the airport runs about every 20 minutes. We were glad not to have to rent a car besides. We got a great deal on this hotel via Hotwire and I would certainly stay there again if my travels take me back to Miami.

Reviews.Title: “Good for a 1 night layover”
Reviews.Author: born2go
Reviews.Content: We got a very good deal with Priceline for this hotel, which is always good:) The room was smallish but certainly updated nicely, with flat screen TV and updated bathroom. I think the small bathroom would have gotten old if I was here on business for a week but perhaps some of the rooms that were overlooking the golf course were larger. Ours was a bit of a hike from the elevator, but can't complain because of the price we payed. The shuttle to/ from the airport was quick and efficient. The pool was lovely! It was heated, overlooked the river and golf course and it was a wonderful way to start the day. Breakfast was very good with nice views, although a bit pricey. One strange thing is that they included a 15% service charge (maybe because this is a business hotel??) and didn't bring the coins back after we paid cash for the breakfast, only the paper money. It was only 50 cents so it wasn't the money loss, it just seemed a bit cheeky.

Reviews.Title: “Best food !”
Reviews.Author: ana p
Reviews.Content: The company I work for had a 1-week meeting at the Sheraton Miami Airport Hotel (the week of Sep. 12th) and we were all impressed with the quality of the food served. We have periodic meetings in different hotels in the city and vicinities, but nothing can be compared to the tasteful food we had at the Sheraton Miami Airport. Thank you chef and kitchen staff for the wonderful menu !

Reviews.Title: “Clean comfortable stay”
Reviews.Author: nickamc80
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for one night. Hotel is nice but major complaint is location and parking. You need to drive little bit to find something to eat or for shopping. Right at the enterance of the MIA airport. Parking is very tight- need more spaces

Reviews.Title: “they charged for parking!!!”
Reviews.Author: cloperalta
Reviews.Content: I think 15 dollars a day is too much to something that should be a service. Rooms dont have refrigerators and if you ask for one, they give you an old and noisy one!!!

Reviews.Title: “Extremely Friendly and Helpful”
Reviews.Author: SalCarrano
Reviews.Content: During my stay there all the staff were kind friendly and helpful, however one person stood out amongst them all, her name was Sofia Lannuzzi and it will be hard to forget her. Her energy and excitement was addicting. When i arrived i asked a young lady a simply question "Wheres a good place to eat " ? she started naming Italian ? Chinese ? Seafood ? Steak? I replied "Whats your favorite food" ? Well her eyes light up as she said Sushi !!!! To my pleasant surprise sushi is my favorite food. she explained where to go, recommended some of the dishes there, and at that moment i knew she was the go to person i can go to for the rest of my stay. Now to be honest with you, the hotel is above average, however the staff will definitely keep me coming back..

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Staff!”
Reviews.Author: TheDarkestStar82
Reviews.Content: Stayed here at the Sheraton Miami Airport Hotel and Convention Center a few months ago. I stayed here one night pre-cruise and again one night post-cruise before I flew home to New York. I was able to use my Starwood Preferred Guest points to get free stays. The shuttle was easy to catch at the airport and arrived at the hotel in just a few minutes. The staff at the front desk were super friendly and professional. I had a great room with a view of the river and nearby golf course. I loved to watch the turtles swimming around as well as the jumping fish! My room was a great size, had a large flat screen TV, and a very comfortable bed. My only complaint was the bathroom counter has a layer of dust and the floor needed some sweeping. Overall, the room was very clean. When I arrived on my cruise ship it dawned on me that I had left my bathing suit hanging up in the bathroom back at the Sheraton. I called the hotel and talked to someone at the front desk, who assured me that they would set my bathing suit aside for when I return to the hotel a few days later. When I arrived back at the Sheraton post-cruise and checked in, they had my bathing suit in a plastic bag waiting for me. I was so thankful! I was then told that it would be a few minutes for me to get into my room as they were waiting on the people in the room to check out. Well the "few minutes" turned into over an hour. So the lady at the front desk gave me access to the Club as a bonus. The Club was great with a variety of breakfast items, dinner appetizers, beverages, complimentary internet access, comfortable seating, and flat screen TVs. The outdoor pool area was great for relaxing in the sun and going for a swim. I did think the restaurant and gift shop/general store in the lobby was kind of pricey, but the service was excellent. I loved the bar staff. They were very friendly and made great drinks! The amazing staff is what made my stays at the Sheraton Miami Airport so enjoyable. I'm definitely staying here every time I am in Miami!

Reviews.Title: “Review of the restaurant staff in the new Sheraton Miami Airport Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Karen H
Reviews.Content: This is my second trip to this hotel for business purposes and I want to mention how great the restaurant staff is, especially Francisco Rocha. I remembered him from last year because he goes out of his way to please, to make you feel like he is there to meet your needs. In this day and age, it is great to find someone who really cares about his job. I can't believe that I remembered him from a year ago. The chef is also great, excellent food. Scotty (been at this this hotel for 34 years) just delivered room service. These guys really make me feel at home. Meanwhile, I had a couple minor issues with the room (remote didn't work, no room service menu). The conceirge staff went out of their way to make things more than right and took care of things immediately. With people like Mr. Rocha, Scotty, the great food in the restaurant, and the quick response to correct any problems really makes me hope that we book this hotel again next year for our meeting. Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Attractive, Super-Convenient to MIA, Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: winebluesea
Reviews.Content: Extremely happy overall experience, starting from booking. Originally booked non-refundable, non-changeable rate online. Then had to call in to change dates because of delays caused by Hurricane Irene. Eventually spoke directly w/ reservations manager, Iriana Garcia, who was more than gracious in rebooking new stay dates. I'm a basic Preferred SPG member, but she was good enough to book me onto the Club floor, where I had a very clean, roomy, '60s-stylish furnished room. The room and the hotel are clearly not new, but equally clearly they have been remodeled and upgraded and don't resemble the cookie-cutter place they probably originally were. Staff throughout the hotel were extremely pleasant, from reception to cleaning staff to restaurant servers. Breakfast was plentiful and varied, with healthy options. SUPER close to MIA, but room offered beautiful and quiet view of water and golf course with skyline beyond. Excellent value at prepaid weekend rate. Only negative: very poor speed internet connection in Club Floor lounge.

Reviews.Title: “Must stay”
Reviews.Author: Manish690
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this Hotel before we headed for 7 days Cruise. We were two families. There is nice golf course right next to the hotel (excellent option for golfers). It was very nice view from the hotel room. Hotel was very clean and service was excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Great service, great staff, great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: GladT
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel, the associates were very nice and helpful. The room was beautiful! The valet attendant Geo Zeledon was very helpful with our car and luggages when we were leaving. There was another male associate that helped us and went above and beyond when we arrived at the hotel. He made us feel special and I wished I knew his name. Thanks Sheraton Hotel! Will recommend this hotel to others!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel for flight layovers... minutes from the airport”
Reviews.Author: robertc2k
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel for spending the night for a flight layover. The airport shuttle service runs every 15 minutes and the hotel is just minutes away. The service at the hotel has always been very good. Stanley at the check-in desk is exceptional. He is always happy to see you and takes very good care of each and every guest. Nothing fancy as far as the rooms go but for a convenient airport hotel it's hard to beat not to mention the price is always excellent. Perfect for the business traveler.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: Contraidentukl
Reviews.Content: I booked a room Priceline. I needed a place to stay the night before my cruise left, and this option worked very well. PROS: - Clean - Quiet - Free Wifi - Free Airport Transfer CONS: - Starwood (HOT) pricing for food - Shoved into room 953 (WAY at the back) Overall, a good option to stay overnight at before your cruise. I will stay here again the next time I leave for a cruise out of Miami.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Executive Meeting Center is perfect backdrop for Beautiful Food Presentation”
Reviews.Author: Chucktree
Reviews.Content: The warm welcome on a Sunday evening at this airport hotel set the tone for an intense two day meeting that flowed with perfection thanks to the professional coordination of the conference service manager and her team as well as our 24/7 access to one of the most comprehensive business centers ever seen. The Executive Meeting Center is one of the best with great conference tables and chairs, built-in A/V equipment and excellent support team--only to outshined by the beautiful Reception and Dinner delivered with perfection in the Ballroom, complete with a visit from the Executive Chef. I utilize many Starwood products and with confidence place this Sheraton among the top ten. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: “A great airport hotel”
Reviews.Author: Laura G
Reviews.Content: Charlotte Sylvain is extremely courteous and helpful at the front desk. She was my critical link in recovering my lost item. I look forward to seeing her again on my next Miami layover. L.G.

Reviews.Title: “Waiter very Friendly”
Reviews.Author: MarcosWeber
Reviews.Content: excellent hotel, I recommend to Brazilians. The waiter Francisco was very friendly (brazilian guy) and it made all the difference. I will be again.

Reviews.Title: “Thank you Stanley”
Reviews.Author: wvugrad2001
Reviews.Content: In my previous review, I took issue with the rude behavior of the front desk staff and Chris the bartender in the Vin Fiz Lounge and praised the customer service provided by Stanley who is a true professional. Those comments are still valid , but I want to give credit where credit is due. I just recently revisited the Sheraton Miami Airport Hotel for the last week of August and have to say that there was noticeable improvement in the front desk staff and the time spent waiting on the phone to have someone answer it. Room was clean and kept that way through the week, staff was friendly displayed a lot less attitude than my last trip. Giuseppe was a great help with my luggage both on arrival and departure. I did not venture back to the Vin Fiz Lounge, but I did enjoy the breakfast buffet at the Rickenbacker. My only suggestion would be to have the cleaning or wait staff who pick up trays after room service not let plates set out for over 8 hours as some items left behind tend to smell and it is not pleasant to walk by them.

Reviews.Title: “Not sure if we would go back!”
Reviews.Author: Rosana L
Reviews.Content: The front desk staff were (mostly the ladies) not courteous, friendly nor pleasant. They wouldn't give any eye contact to customers. I felt very intimidated asking questions. It was as if they didn't have time to help us. We were booked at the hotel for 4 nights. On Day 2 of our stay, our room was not cleaned. We left the room at 11 a.m. for the Dolphin Mall, came back at 9.15 p.m. and was shocked that the room had not been cleaned. We called front desk (took ages before they answered the phone) and they did send someone to clean. We ended up waiting in the lobby for another half hour while it was being cleaned. On the other hand, the concierge, more specifically, Geo Zeledon, went the extra mile. He was very helpful in taking us by shuttle to a nearby grocery place (paid $5.00 return) to buy some fruits. He was very friendly and deserves to be recognize for his assistance.

Reviews.Title: “marvelous”
Reviews.Author: chen w
Reviews.Content: the lady at the front desk was very sweet plite and respectable if i can recall her name was torie ,she was very helpful too me because i am carrying child and she made sure i was accomadated with refrigeration and each time i came to use the microwave she stopped what she was doing for me .We chatted I told her i never seen her before at the sheraton she replied yes because i am a new face i've been here two weeks .for that amount of time i think that torie is a great employee at the front desk if i could recognize her more for this would.I asked her for her name she gave it to me with no problem eventhough I tried to scare her up as if I was going to make a complaint with her boss she was not scared she knew she hadn't done anything wrong.Torie is a very fast but exact and straight to the point of everything I needed to know .This hotel experience was very nice and I also was assited by a lady by the name of charol @ the front desk she was very nice to my family and I thanx these two women for providing my family and i with a great room hope to see you soon .chen-

Reviews.Title: “LOVED EVERY MINUTE!”
Reviews.Author: Smith143
Reviews.Content: PAUL CALDERON WAS EXCELLENT! All of the staff, especially the bellmen, were very helpful and friendly as well. Guest services were immaculate! We will definitely be going back for future trips in Miami!

Reviews.Title: “Very short stay but excellent service from Front Desk Staff...resturant needs help”
Reviews.Author: wheretoonextyall
Reviews.Content: Arrived late but upon check in the over night staff was amazing....I stayed only one night(2am) on August 13 and had the most welcoming smile by the front office gentleman.......Upon my check out i visited the resturant where i recieved the worst service ever....The waiter only visited my friends and i table twice and he walked away for good.....we never saw him again.....very disappointing concidering the food was aweful as i had the margarita pizza...he returant sucks but the hotel staff is killer!!

Reviews.Title: “Very close to the airport and walking distance to the rental car building.”
Reviews.Author: GeorgeAlbuquerque
Reviews.Content: Nice and comfortable room. Fast and friendly front desk staff. Great breakfast. Perfect if you arrive from a late flight. We had a god night sleep and excellent breakfast and just walked across the street to pick up our rental car. Restaurant had a great dinner too!

Reviews.Title: “Vin Fiz Lounge”
Reviews.Author: theflyingmango
Reviews.Content: Miguel (bartender) went above and beyond to accommodate me. I chatted with him about white wine and how I wished they had a better selection at the lounge. I showed him a picture of the wine I liked. He asked if I would be around tomorrow and I replied with a yes. I honestly did not expect him to go out of his way to pick up a wine that I liked with his own money. Later the next day I got a call from the GM asking for my address to send the bottle of white wine that Miguel got for me. I was honestly shocked. Miguel was on the ball when it came to customer care. I had an issue ordering food from Chris (server/bartender) and Miguel noticed. He came right over to intervene to handle the situation. The service Miguel provided was awesome. You never expect service like this from a bar/lounge. Very pleasant surprise indeed. Thank you Miguel. My stay at the Sheraton Miami Airport was exceptional because of the excellent customer care you provided. I'll be sure to thank you properly on my next visit.

Reviews.Title: “Great service Great people”
Reviews.Author: mintzchoco
Reviews.Content: We were greeted with very friendly people at the airport as well when we arrived at the hotel. Torri, the lady that assisted us at the front desk was extremely helpful in letting us know what was available to us on the ground floor (e.g. gift shops, restaurants, bars). Overall, the atmosphere created by the employees and their services were very warm and welcoming. Definitely a hotel to choose if planning business trips or overnight stays in Miami.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Jenny4122
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel while we put in hurricane proof windows in our home. I have to stay the service was exceptional. The front desk, especially Tori, was very accommodating. My car was always waiting for me when I can down to the lobby (I just phone front desk to get it). The bathroom and rooms were clean. This was very important to me because we had our 1 year old daughter with us. We were also able to take advantage of the club lounge, where we had appetizers and breakfast for free everyday. We trust the Starwood Properties. They are the best!

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home”
Reviews.Author: D3uce318
Reviews.Content: Comfortable beds, spotless rooms, and friendly staff. In the restauraunt a waiter named Francisco was extremely cordial, and helped with everything that we asked for. His service was beyond good and was intuitive. Any need that I came up with in my mind he filled without me even asking. Definitely worth the stay.

Reviews.Title: “Very Helpful Staff”
Reviews.Author: Veronika N
Reviews.Content: The hotel has very nice rooms that are very clean and well kept. The staff around the entire hotel is very friendly and is always willing to help. Nicole at the front desk was helpful and very friendly about any requests we made, and Emilo was extremely kind and helpful on the mezzanine level. I would definitely come back to stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Respectful”
Reviews.Author: d b
Reviews.Content: I starwood memeber maduro loved my service from trainee tori during the stay at the sheraton,she was well respectable,funny,and placed herself into my shoes.I do recommend this hotel again for these reasons.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!”
Reviews.Author: eht13
Reviews.Content: Manager and staff were very hospitable. The restaurant staff were very nice and courteous, and didn't mind striking up a conversation with you. Also, they have discounts for breakfast. Ask someone at the front desk for a little discount card! very nice and clean, and the beds are very comfortable. Also, it is right next to the airport (and close to south beach!), so instead of taking a 25$ taxi, you can just get a free ride to the airport from the hotel shuttle, and then take a shuttle from the airport for about 3 dollars. Work out facility is good too. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: “Solid airport hotel”
Reviews.Author: jsantivanez
Reviews.Content: Right across the street from MIA rental car facility. Very clean, no noticeable airport noise, excellent check-in service & free shuttle. Got a room for less than $60 on a bid site as well. If you have the time, it's also got a decent golf course right behind it.

Reviews.Title: “Comfy, clean and excellent service!”
Reviews.Author: lipsforchrist
Reviews.Content: We stayed here while we waited for a flight the next day. The rooms were nice, the shampoo smelled lovely, and the service couldn't have been better. Everyone was over and beyond both helpful and kind to our family. The restaurant (Rickenbacker) inside this hotel was DELICIOUS! The best burger we've ever had and again, over and above service. Our only regret is that we didn't get to stay for longer.

Reviews.Title: “Great service, great food and comfy beds!”
Reviews.Author: Marilyn C
Reviews.Content: I was in town for training in the Sheraton's executive meeting center, and a company dinner. Wow, the EMC was everything we needed, fully the best training facility I have used in years! The banquet food was amazing and service staff too. My entire team felt pampered and we were able to engage completely in our training. I know we will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Get location - Great service”
Reviews.Author: joseph t
Reviews.Content: I am in Miami (airport area) virtually every week for the last year and started staying at the Sheraton Airport. First because it was close but now I have gotten use to the wonderful service. The staff is very friendly and they go out of the way to make my stay work. Because of the service I even stay at this Sheraton when my travels take me to other areas of South Florida.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable.”
Reviews.Author: Coba5
Reviews.Content: Very close to airport. Rooms are comfortable, however one of our rooms was kind of dusty. Parking is self service at $14/day. Need a car to go anywhere even a supermarket.

Reviews.Title: “Excellant airport hotel”
Reviews.Author: PamelaHelenEllis
Reviews.Content: the Sheraton is 500 yards from the car rental centre by the airport; easy to find. The hotel was very clean and has a beautiful pool, golf course views and large inviting lobby. Free starbucks coffee :) Breakfast was excellant. We had the buffet and were served fresh squeezed OJ and had a chef's omelette prepared by Domingo (very good). Our sever was Cecelia - she was pleasant and attentive. A very positive experience - we would defiantely stay again. We booked on Westjet hotels site and got a great rate with free breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “very comfortable room and very efficient staff”
Reviews.Author: Pierre55
Reviews.Content: Perfect stop over in Miami .beautifull room ,very clean swimming pool.We 'll be back next week on our way back to Europe.

Reviews.Title: “Just bad”
Reviews.Author: jojoearth
Reviews.Content: The Good 1. I had an overnight layover and was initially impressed with the service at check in. 2. Went up to the room, nice modern decor. 3. Room had a nice view of the golf course and lake. 4. They have a free shuttle to Miami International Airport. The Bad 1. Sat down to write a phone number at the desk, someone had used the pen to stir coffee or urine. It smelled so bad and leaked all over the place. 2. Went to use the bathroom, it was extremely small and the tub had not been cleaned. Several hooks were missing from the shower curtain and the pipes under the sink were exposed and rested on the towels. 3. There was an ironing board but no iron. 4. I called the front desk to find out about printing my boarding pass, no answer. I called for 10 minutes from the hotel phone and my cell. Could not get anyone to pick up. Finally, I went downstairs to the desk only to find there were three or four people behind the counter having a good time while one checked someone in. 5. $12 for self parking? Two people came to see me and we went out for coffee instead of paying $12 for an hour or two. 6. Internet $9.99 a day. No thanks. I did not complain because I was only there for one night. This was my first and last stay at a Sheraton.

Reviews.Title: “Great! Would stay again!!!!”
Reviews.Author: jayshar
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just return home today from a 4 day stay at the Sheraton. We was there celebrating our 1st wedding anniversary. They have the best hotel staff ever!! Everyone from the Shuttle bus drivers to housekeeping work their buns off to make your stay a pleasant one. Our room had a great view of the golf course, it was clean and came with a Air Purifier .Nice amenities in the bathroom. The workout center is fully equip, pool area is small but nice. The only thing stopping me from give this hotel 5 stars is the parking and the food in the restaurant.The parking was inconvenient and food wasn't very good , We would recommend this hotel and stay again!!! All hotels should have a staff like this hotel!!! Thanks everyone at the Sheraton for making us feel comfortable and welcome!!!. Hope to stay there again next year!!

Reviews.Title: “The hotel was fine, but don't trust them.”
Reviews.Author: Jessica B
Reviews.Content: My family booked a cruise out of Miami for June 2011. We drove down the day before the cruise left to do some sight-seeing and stay the night. The Sheraton was our choice because they have a place where we can keep our car while on our cruise and they had a free shuttle to the terminal. Plus the picture that you see looks nice... We were able to keep our car there like we booked ahead of time, but they had gotten rid of the free shuttle service. No one could tell me why I called two days before check-in to confirm our reservations and shuttle, and everything was fine then. They were "kind" enough to call us a taxi when we asked and quoted us $24, but instead, they called us a private car service which we didn't notice there was a difference until we had to pay at the ship terminal. Thanks to Sheraton, our Free shuttle cost us $80 for a 3 mile trip!!! When we got back from our trip, we hailed a taxi at the terminal and were told AND charged $15 for the ride back to the hotel to get our car. The taxi driver said that they have to charge flat fees for certain trips and ours was one of them. Also, the picture you see above for the water view Sheraton is not quite true. The front of the hotel is at the airport. The view is freeway, parking garages, and terminals. The view didn't matter to us being there only one night, but the noise was typical for an airport. The back of the hotel, which is "sort-of" depicted here is a canal and golf course, and not a peaceful lake as depicted here. Our room was small for what we are used to with hotel rooms, but maybe it was just because it was on the end. We were told we were given a Starwood Prefered upgrade, so I am wondering what the normal rooms are like. There were some positives... The pool was nice, they offer free use of a few computers in a common area to check email, and there is a place to buy Starbucks in the lobby.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient Stopover Point”
Reviews.Author: joeb1249
Reviews.Content: I had an overnight layover in Miami and wanted somewhere close to the airport for the few short hours I would have to sleep. The Sheraton at MIA is within a five minute drive from the terminal and was quite convenient. When I got on the hotel shuttle, the driver asked if I was a Starwood member, and when I answered "yes', he radioed ahead to the front desk that I was on the way. When I arrived at the reception desk, they quickly checked me in and gave me my room key. The room was comfortable and the staff were efficient. The hotel shuttle leaves every 15 minutes, so getting back to the airport for an early morning departure was not a problem. If i have another stopover in Miami, I would not hesitate to book the airport Sheraton.

Reviews.Title: “more like a slightly better motel 6”
Reviews.Author: wimpdiver
Reviews.Content: The good - closest to airport, frequent free shuttle, friendly staff (but they never follow up on promises) The bad - old very poorly maintained rooms, understaffed so everything takes forever and the phone is either not answered by front desk or only answered after 30 (I'm not kidding) rings or so. No one takes responsibility to follow up on promises - staff doesn't seem to have power to correct problems and management is MIA:(

Reviews.Title: “Very Cloe to the airport.”
Reviews.Author: Itapipoca
Reviews.Content: If you're going to use the free shuttle bus, you should check the pickup place and schedule in advance with the hotel. ZERO information at the airport. And staff at the information booth is not alway there.

Reviews.Title: “Great Time in Miami! Thanks, Paul!”
Reviews.Author: MDS1
Reviews.Content: We arrived at the Sheraton later than expected and were tired. During check-in, we had a little delay, but thanks to Paul Calderon, it was a breeze! He was SO helpful and such a joy. We were not very happy with our room and he found us another one IMMEDIATELY! Thanks to him our stay was a pleasant one. The room was comfortable, with a great view. I'd also like to thank Armando for his wonderful valet service. He even remembered our car and got it for us in record time! We'll definitely stay there again when in the area!

Reviews.Title: “Chaotic - Average accomodations at best”
Reviews.Author: Vonderbach
Reviews.Content: Booked this room for two nights beginning Aug 2nd. Reception and Bell service was prompt given the conditions (two children trying to negotiate access to their room without a parent?) Check in was courteous, signed up for the frequent stay program in the off chance that I ever frequent another Sheraton...who knows? Upon entering the room, I found the remote control to be unresponsive. Ordinarily this would be no problem, just call maintenance and have them come up and fix it. However, what should have been a simple call ended up being a 20 minute wait. After calling for the remote, I find I have no bar soap in my room, not even liquid soap..just shampoo and lotion. Again, not a problem. However, this required two phone calls and 20 minutes as well. The housekeeping lady was abrupt, nothing spectacular about her delivery of the soap...quite average I suppose. The maintenance man was very friendly and traced the problem to what was likely the prior guest trying to hook up something to the television. So about 30 minutes after check-in, I could finally relax. As for the room....it was just average. Standard size, mini fridge, small bathroom...nothing stood out as being extraordinary..which with the Sheraton name, I sort of expected. I should note at this point that I booked this room via Hotwire, so truth be known, I have little to complain about. The reason I review rooms is not to condemn, but because I know that hotel management reads these reviews. By sharing my experience, other guests can gauge their reaction to my troubles and perhaps report back with more positive experiences as a result. All in all I suppose I'll get a good nights sleep. I wrote this only two hours after check-in, so we'll see how I feel when I check out.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: skip0358
Reviews.Content: Wife and I stayed there 7/20 & 7/29 before and after our vacation. Our rooms were very nice,bar and restaurant were very nice. We used the indoor parking which we found very nice. Here's a hint book the parking online and prepay we saved $50. The shuttle was clean and on time. Would deffinatly stay again!!

Reviews.Title: “So much has happened - and I've only been here for an hour!”
Reviews.Author: MiddleNameGO10019
Reviews.Content: First shuttle bus whizzed by me - it looked full. After another :15 the second bus actually stopped. The driver got out and said he was full, that I'd have to wait for the next bus (with no assurance IT wouldn't be full). Made my way through the cesspool that is the Miami airport and found the taxi line. After quite a wait in the oppressive heat I got a cab - $13 ride. At hotel. This should be good. So I give my information and confirm my preferences for quiet location and all that goes with that. I said "is it a Pure room"? It wasn't, even though my reservation clearly states that. I ask for a refund of the cab fare. They were about to deny it (because the driver hadn't filled out the receipt) and then Stanley appears. Stanley was doggedly determined to save the day but I had been pushed too far and was ready to leave the property and go to another. Despite my protests about not wanting something for nothing, he put me on the club level and offered me breakfast. I said "I have two full American breakfasts on my reservation." Alas, like my Pure room confirmation (I had the paperwork, from the booking I had made on Starwood.com), their records didn't reflect this either. Stanley persevered, showing me the hotel amenities and graciously taking my luggage to the room. He saved the moment and did so with total professionalism, a dose of empathy, and a great sense of humor. So while I wish I could give the property a four rating, here's why it's a three - the room is quite pleasant, but the a/c is a little weak for such a hot climate. I have been in on airports hotels with better soundproofed windows, but these are just good. I had trouble getting connected to the wireless internet - when I tried to call downstairs, using the "guest services" button on the phone, the dialing is by pulse (vs by tone) then goes to a fast busy. I had to resort to calling "0". And I am set up at the desk looking for a place to plug in my laptop. Nada. I love the belt line outlets offered by so many properties. While I often stay at Starwood properties, it's been quite a while since I stayed at a Sheraton. I don't know if it's the locale, the generation, or the brand, but this experience didn't stand up for an intrepid business traveler. So to be fair, the hotel is solidly good, but Stanley does deserve FIVE STARS for his awesome handling of a frustrating situation. Commendable and a level of service that we wish was the norm, but simply isn't anymore. Bravo.

Reviews.Title: “Always a pleasant place to stay near the airport”
Reviews.Author: MStangle
Reviews.Content: We have stayed several times at the Sheraton Miami Airport Hotel as a stopover (from California) before flying to a Caribbean island and have always had a most wonderful stay. The Sheraton Miami Airport Hotel is the perfect place to stay prior to air travel as itâ€™s a 10-minute ride to/from the airport (being the closest hotel to the airport), has efficient shuttle service, a friendly staff and comfortable rooms. The rooms are a good size, very clean with very comfortable beds and bedding. Among other things, I was impressed with the free bottles of water that are provided in the room. The bathroom amenities include most anything youâ€™d need for an overnight stay and the front desk provides other essentials if needed. You can get room service if youâ€™d like your breakfast to arrive as youâ€™re getting ready for the day. You can print boarding passes and check real-time flight status, although sometimes the computers are occupied and sometimes the printer isnâ€™t responding. There is a business center on the second floor if thereâ€™s a problem at the computers in the lobby. The staff is very friendly and unhesitatingly offers help when you have a need. We have not eaten in the restaurant, mainly because we usually arrive past dinner-time and instead we grab a light meal in the Vin Fiz Lounge. The quesadillas here are very good and there are other tasty options on the bar menu. We have been fortunate to be waited on by Yury Fernandez who was tending bar during most of our visits. We appreciate his kind and efficient service with both food and beverages and almost feel like heâ€™s an â€˜old friendâ€™ now when we arrive. Jury is a very considerate man and is an asset to the hotel. During our last stay, we also met Diego A Comesana, who is the Food and Beverage Manager. He too was very nice and shared a genuine interest in making sure that guests were accommodated. The Sheraton Miami Airport Hotel now feels like a â€˜home away from homeâ€™. We wouldnâ€™t hesitate to recommend it as a place to stay during your stopover before heading to the airport. You will feel well rested, refreshed and ready to go after staying here! Weâ€™ll be back.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Stay”
Reviews.Author: Roland W
Reviews.Content: A typical Sheraton Hotel, nice reception hall, clean rooms, good fitness area, good food in the restaurant. Pool has sun from morning till eveining and it's 24 hours accesible. Friendly staff and a good overall impression. This hotel is good not only for an overnight stay if you land in Miami. Good connections to nearby local attractions (Everglades)

Reviews.Title: “Airport Stopover plus a round of golf”
Reviews.Author: SksAdvntr
Reviews.Content: This was a stopover at the start of vacation, as I was waiting for my wife to arrive in town. The hotel is OK - the only reason I stayed here was because of the proximity to the airport, it was a Starwood property, and the pool looked decent. I got a very good deal, so I think it was decent for the price. My room was somewhat dated - a good size, but everything could use a refresh. I ate a dinner and a lunch at the restaurant - the food was OK, nothing spectacular. Other guests seemed to be doing a conference or a stopover like I was. The service was pretty good - had some good help getting over to a nearby restaurant to watch a basketball game (odd that I couldn't watch it at the hotel...) - and the food at the restaurant ended up being good too. The locals are friendly and happy hour was very fun. The second day, after looking at the golf course, I decided to head down for a round. Got a great deal on the golf - rentals, plus cart, for about $60 or something like that. It was twilight pricing, but I easily got a round of 18 in. The course is called Melreese Country Club or International Links Miami - and has the distinction of being the first course Tiger Woods played as a Pro, I think. I was paired up with a gentleman in his fifties and his son-in-law - very friendly. The fairways and greens were in good condition - rental clubs were decent (Tayler made Burner irons and woods). The course was not as challenging as I thought it would be - I hit in the 90s, which reflects that it played pretty easy for a mediocre golfer (high handicapper). So - if you're in the area, and not inspired to work - go hit a round. Twilight rate was a good deal, but their visitor rate is not very good for a regular round. Overall, an OK stay - hotel could use some upgrades, but proximity to golf and airport are positives. Pool looked nice too, although I didn't take a dip myself.

Reviews.Title: “beware of parking costs & local calls from room”
Reviews.Author: bellabahama
Reviews.Content: stayed at this hotel which was formally the Wyndham, now called Sheraton. However parking charges stay the same and very costly. each time you leave the garage and park again is more money. Hotel best for people with no car. beware of local call charges even though 786 is a shared local call with 305 area codes. I was stilled charged as long distance. otherwise great staff. beautifully kept rooms, modern styling and free business center and free shuttles.' would stay again, without a rental car.

Reviews.Title: “5 STAR SERVICE”
Reviews.Author: SLTRAUGOTT
Reviews.Content: From valet parking to our leaving the hotel, the two nights we spent at this hotel was beyond excellent. Courtsey was shown at all times. The room was beautiful and comfortable. The view was excellent of the river, golf course and Miami city skyline. We hope to return to this hotel to relive this experience again. Enjoy.

Reviews.Title: “Decent value for a business stay”
Reviews.Author: jbcarioca
Reviews.Content: This hotel is unchanged from the Wyndham it was a year ago. It is a good option if you have a car and do not expect much. Otherwise stay someplace else.

Reviews.Title: “my son and I loved,and for shore we'll be back.”
Reviews.Author: Leda55711
Reviews.Content: We had a good time at the hotel, was nice and the service was excellent. The employees was very helpful and friendly special at restourant at breakfast time when we was served by a fantastic employee Francisco Rocha whom took the time to to answer my son 11 years questions. The Hotel Sharaton is very luck to have a exceptional employee like him, my son did't want to leave and I told to we'll be back. Thanksfor the great experience.

Reviews.Title: “Best stateside airport hotel I have ever stayed at”
Reviews.Author: DrAndyN
Reviews.Content: With more than 4 million miles in the last 15 years, I've stayed at a bunch of hotels, and always cringe when I see the client has booked me at an airport hotel. Not this one - great staff, particularly Ernesto who works with planning and executing meeting rooms and events. Nice pool, good views, excellent food, good business center with free printing and faxing, comfortable sleeping room. I will be glad to return to this airport hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay, try it you will be suprised!”
Reviews.Author: Nictore
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at the Miami Sheraton on our way out of town, I was skeptical at first coming from working at a large hospitality chain and hving high expectations that is not under the Sheraton branch but to my amazment there were suprises around every corner, Location: If you are looking for close you've got it, it is a stone thrown from the airport. situation on a beautiful golf course instead of your usually airport overview from your window. Check in: We did wait but not more than 6 minutes, what do you expect from a high volume airport hotel, I think the girl at the desk was proficent, informative and genuine in our check in process. While in line the you could see the General Manager was walking through making sure all the guests were comfortable in thier wait time. Rooms: Well appointed, clean and ofcourse you cannot beat the comfort of the bed! Usually in airport hotels you do get alot of noise all night from people coming in and out, but not here, we slept like a drea. If you are going to stay I woulod suggest the executive 14th floor, the amenities in the executive club are great for traverlers and kids. There are free snacks, internet, huge tv's, a pool table and couches. It seemed to be the gathering place which overlooked the golf course and the tarmack as well. Dinner: The restraunt threw me for a loop, I had the pasta my daughter and husband had the pork and my father had the steak. The presentation rivaled something out of a 5 diamond establishment and the taste left us wanting more, you could see the others in the restruant as well were enjoying their service. The chef came around to everyones table numerous times to see if there were any questions and how everything was. I give a thumbs up to our waiter, whom i wanted to recruit for my property, his guest service interactions were seemless! Departure: As fast and efficient as one can imagine, tram was waiting when we arrived at the doors to take us on our way and the bellman was nice enough to offer us water or jiuce for our journey to the airport. Reading other reviews, it dissapoints me that people would nit pick, even the best hotels sometimes have minor issues, it is the care and genuism of the people whom shape your journey while you are there, from the girl at check in, to the waiter, general manager and chef that left a lasting impression for us to return for many times to come.

Reviews.Title: “Nice pool, right at the airport, ok staff”
Reviews.Author: occasionaltravels
Reviews.Content: We had an overnight layover and the shuttle didn't take long to come by at 10pm. The lobby and room was modern and clean. The receptionist guy had some issues with our online booking and didn't really say why it was taking over 10min to figure out, and then was rude and annoyed about it. Plus I asked him for a wake up call for 5am in order to catch our flight, which never came. Luckily I had set my own alarm. The pool was nice for the hour it was still open, then we got room service which was actually cash-only, so luckily we had bills on us when the food came. Our 6am shuttle was prompt as well.

Reviews.Title: “nice people!”
Reviews.Author: jensam98
Reviews.Content: Got stuck with flight issues at 10pm on a Sunday night. After waiting for the shuttle for another hotel for 30 minutes we jumped on the Sheraton bus. Nice place, price was reasonable but I was pleasantly surprised at the great attitude and helpfulness of the staff. The folks at check in had me up to speed on what I needed to know (grill hours, shuttle times) and I had a key in hand in three minutes. Liked the flight schedule right in the lobby. Food at the grill was pretty good and the bartender was friendly. The room was standard issue with beds very comfortable. Big flat screen TV. I've not had many experiences in this general area to make comparisons- regardless this will be my go-to place next time we need accomdations near MIA. Also, the shuttle was very timely and there were more than one running during our time in and back out.

Reviews.Title: “It was a nice stay”
Reviews.Author: NiceT60805
Reviews.Content: The issues that we had with our stay was the windows were filled with a sap like substance and bugs and dust. The water when showering would not get hot unless we turned it to the hottest point then turned it off then back on again. A couple of the younger customer services reps were not attentive and failed to mention to us that we had to swipe our card to leave the parking garage so that we wouldn't be charged $14 each time that we left. They were busy conversing and joking around instead of assisting. The bed linen was DIRTY and looked as if they hadn't washed or changed it so that kind of made us a little uncomfortable. I will add that Geo Zeledon was excellent with assisting us with our arrival and departure. He assisted with our bags and car service and was very nice and helpful. The hotel was not a horrible stay and it was nice for the price. With a few adjustments, it can be an excellent place to stay. it is very convenient to the airport and 95. There is a nice view of the golf course and it has a very relaxing atmosphere. After raising our concerns with the hotel manager, they were quickly resolved.

Reviews.Title: “Great location next to the airport”
Reviews.Author: relayer
Reviews.Content: I got this Sheraton bidding through Priceline and it could not have been more convenient for a layover. Our plane got in around 10pm and the shuttle was no more than a 5 minute wait. With an 11am flight in the morning I was happy the hotel is located right across the street from the airport. Again, the shuttle was waiting for us in the morning. The hotel was inviting inside when entering the lobby. Staff was friendly when checking in. We stopped in the bar/restaurant for a late dinner and it hit the spot. The king room was nicely appointed and clean, the bed comfortable and it's always a plus to actually get HD channels in the room. The only minor drawback of this stay was a bathroom tub that could have used a little updating. Overall this is a good choice for the Miami Airport because of its location and efficient shuttle, even better when getting it on Priceline.

Reviews.Title: “Convennient transportation and nice staffs”
Reviews.Author: leonzhang
Reviews.Content: As a SPG member, we booked this hotel for short distance to Everglade NP and Miami Downtown and Miami Beach. I'm especially grateful of the warm hospitality offered by Juan Flornce, the client manager and his colleagues. They nicely held the member room for me even I was so late to check in. I also got parking fee validation and free lounge access for the whole period of my stay. Thanks you guys, good job! Leon Zhang @ San Jose, CA

Reviews.Title: “Great facility and outstanding service for productive meetings”
Reviews.Author: artcab
Reviews.Content: DO Facilities are great to held productive meetings. The hotel staff takes care of everything so you can keep focus of your event with no "surprises" on the rest: rooms, food, catering, etc. Being close to the airport and offer a shuttle service is a plus for business travelers DON'T None

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing”
Reviews.Author: Jackie10101
Reviews.Content: Upon Check in I was given a room at the very end of a long hallway, although I am 7 months pregnant and just arrived from a 12 hour flight. When I opened the door of my room I discovered its already being used. I had to walk all the back and request a new one. On the way to the reception I met another hotel guest that just experienced the same thing. In my actual guest room several things were missing: soap (instead the maids put the shower gel on the soap tray), the "do not disturb" tag, a pen for completing the hotel experience questionnaire and spoons for the in room coffee maker. Also the windows were extremely dirty. The breakfast was - apart from the big selection of fresh fruit - not very good. The pastries were of cheap supermarket quality, the cheese plate consisted of Kraft's style sliced cheeses all smashed on one plate. All in all I would have expected more from a Sheraton, it rather felt like staying at a Quality Inn.

Reviews.Title: “I Will Wait for Hotel Renovation Before Going Back”
Reviews.Author: PAQ
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at Sheraton hotels all over the world as a Platinum Level Starwood Preferred Guest. This renamed, but not yet renovated, Sheraton, needs help. It is a 1 minute shuttle ride from Miami International Airport, and I was pleasantly surprised that airplane sound was modest. I noticed a lot of airline crew stayed there. It has a large club loung with simple breakfast food and TVs and 2 computers with a printer. The hotel really needs a several million dollar renovation to be called a Sheraton. Right now it is more like a Days Inn. If and when this hotel is renovated, I expect to stay here a lot more often, especially for the $126/night rate. Front desk staff were pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “we loved it and we will be back”
Reviews.Author: otrebor23
Reviews.Content: made the trip possible by the help of Nicole very nice girl also Raquel and Henry were super, thank you for your warm hospitality. Thank Nicole for going the extra mile with us

Reviews.Title: “Our Oasis After the Storm”
Reviews.Author: abrito57
Reviews.Content: Iâ€™m very please with the service, hospitality and professionalism of all the stuff at this facility, they really make the difference and change my mind about the SPG program. We had a really bad experience at the facility we were before we arrive to this one and I was seriously considering canceling my membership in the program but your representative Raquel Masis with her care and professionalism make all the change in the world. I just want to give credit where credit is due. Iâ€™m very please and satisfy with all the services and all the stuff and I will definitely stay with you again and recommend you to others. I thank you on behalf of my self and my family. Regards, Adel Brito

Reviews.Title: “front desk girls”
Reviews.Author: VilmaMM
Reviews.Content: came with my daughter and i used to love this hotel but this time the service was so bad specially the girls in the front desk Cecilia and Raquel Masis both of them need to know about how to be polite with clients, very disrespectful and rude. to work in the front desk they need to manage better their attitude because they are the first impression and the face of the brand ...and they live me a very bad one. So bad that i dont want to come back and i will not recommend this hotel i came with friends and fell ashamed because i told them about the good hotel this was and i found a very different one. The rest was Ok not Excellent but ok The guys from the bar Chris and Miguel are very nice boys you can see that they enjoy woking to give good service you should have more people like them and this hotel would be so incredible.

Reviews.Title: “Worst Service Ever”
Reviews.Author: melaymiranda
Reviews.Content: one of the reasons my mom and i picked this hotel was because of the good service we received a year ago when it was the Wyndham Hotel, and definitely we dont want to come back. First of all THE FRONT DESK SERVICE IS THE WORST EVER, the people working at the front desk are extemely rude, specially the girl from Argentina she always in a mad mood and clients get that feeling. Also several of times i couldnt go into my room there was to many problems with the key card, when i went to fornt desk the boy who was there treat like i was a criminal because there was no register of me an my mother, also one night my room( by the way my room is 829) wasnt clean and my mother went downstairs to the front desk to complain and the girl who speak spanish laugh at her face and leave her hanging so disrespectful....what a bad impression we are taking from this hotel and also the brand Sheraton, we didnt came that far ( Venezuela) to receive such a bad service. The only person who knows about culture service is Miguel from the bar, people like him knows how to treat clients from the hotel. I hope this review helps to improve the services you give to your clients. thank you Melay Miranda & Vilma Men ( Venezuela)

Reviews.Title: “Came for Aniversary it was great”
Reviews.Author: dfromsvr
Reviews.Content: came for a special occasion we were here for 3 nights and 3 days. Hard to find when coming for first time past it 3 times before finding the hotel. The view of our room was great the gentelman that checked us in upgraded us to a King bed viewing the golf course a beautil view of the lake with the jumping fish. He was the mangaer at the Spg line.The food in the restaurant was excellent ate there alomst everyday if not for breakfast for dinner too. Found flyers for restaurants left underneath door of hotel room, ordered from Italian Restaurant the food was not good the dinners tasted like canned food, called the restaurant to complain the gentelman was rude and hung us up. So we came back to the Hotel and went to the bar where Miguel and Chris were working, excellent they treated us great had some light food, We have been back to see both Miguel and Chris at the Vin Fiz Lounge every night since we have been here. These guys go above and beyond, spoke with the manager of the restaurant and bar too tell him how great these guys are he offered us a drink on him. So when we come back to Miami we are coming back to see Miguel and Chris they made us feel at home, we talked like we have been friends for a long time gave them our phone number for when they are in Orando to look us up. We check out tomorrow to go to Fort Lauderdale to another Sheraton for our last night before going back home. We will be back the only thing i did not like was the expensive parking fee. I work for the Sheraton Vistana Resort and the employee discount is great especially the discount for the food. Everyone at the Front Desk was helpful and the bellman was great for directions for and things to do in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: Wana2
Reviews.Content: After a long day in the airport with cancelled flights, the staff at the hotel went above and beyond getting us rooms for the night. We were greeted by friendly and funny front desk staff (Stanley Pierre and Sophia) who immediately saw we were having a rough day. They upgraded us and made us laugh at the same time. Chris at the bar also helped us unwind by making us laugh while providing excellent customer service. These guys all provided fantastic service, were very personable and were very appreciated.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel really needs an update. Service is good.”
Reviews.Author: bamydood
Reviews.Content: A friendly airport hotel but the rooms are dated, tired, the wallpaper peeling in the early 90s bathroom. The place definitely needs fresh carpets and surfaces and furnishings, if you stay in a newer hotel these rooms are disappointing. Friendly service, though,and the constantly circling airport shuttle is a nice advantage.

Reviews.Title: “Good: Closest property to the airport Bad: Renovations needed”
Reviews.Author: miamiskyboy
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel four times in the last 10 weeks. Overall its a nice place and you can see the progress in the renovations that are SLOWLY taking place. POSITIVE: I have come across some staff memners that are truly great. Most of those work during the day hours, but if its a PH shift the seem to be quite rude. I guess its becasue the managment is not there to supervise. The hotel is without a doubt the closest property to MIA Airport. The only other hotel that is closer is the MIA Airport Hotel that is located inside the terminal. But that property is old, outdated and over priced. So at the end of the day, this property is a better option. The hotel recenly went back to the Sheraton brand and has been going thru some updated and renovations. Most of the work being done is coming out nicley and the hotel lobby looks new and fresh. But it also looks cheap and not very upscale. Perhaps when its all done it will look/feel more plush. The beds here are incredibly soft and delicious. The rooms are also very clean. There is anewly renovated finess center and a refershing pool with towels and plenty of lounge chairs. The hotel does have dedicated SPG rooms for Elite Members as well as the new Respire rooms. Internet works very well and is provided free of charge. There is also a nice work desk in all the rooms along with an ergonomic chair in the newer rooms. NEGATIVES: The property is older and has been thru several names. In the process it has lost its identity, and so, when you walk in, you dont think "Im at the Sheraton" .
